host_about:
Top Villas Mallorca, hat sich in langjähriger Erfahrung darauf spezialisiert, das richtige Feriendomizil für Sie auszusuchen.
Über 300 Fincas, Ferienhäuser und Apartments sorgen für eine reichhaltige Auswahl! Diese vermitteln wir von privat an privat.
Die angebotenen Häuser und Apartments sind auf der ganzen Insel verteilt - mehrheitlich sind sie im schönen Norden von Mallorca zu finden.
Ob in Küstennähe oder im Landesinneren, ob eine kleine, romantische Finca oder ein großes prachtvolles Herrenhaus, traditionell-rustikal oder modern und exklusiv ausgestattet - für alle Kundenwünsche haben und finden wir die passende Finca.
Wir führen ausschließlich die von uns begutachteten Ferienunterkünfte, damit Ihr Urlaub auf Mallorca eine echte Erholung wird.
Unser erfahrenes Team betreut und vermittelt seit Jahren nur Unterkünfte mit höchsten Qualitätsansprüche in der Ausstattung, Funktionalität und Sauberkeit. Durch den direkten Kontakt zu den Hauseigentümern können wir jederzeit auf besondere Wünsche eingehen.
Profitieren Sie von unserer zuverlässigen, ehrlichen und schnellen Betreuung von der Buchung bis zur Anreise. Und, wir sind für Sie immer erreichbar - 7 Tage die Woche, dadurch können wir bei Bedarf auch rasch vor Ort handeln.
Gerne begrüsst Sie unser deutschsprachiges Team im Büro und bietet Ihnen Betreuung auch während Ihrer Urlaubstage an, damit die schönsten Tage des Jahres für Sie unvergesslich bleiben. Wir freuen uns auf Sie!

name: Sa Teulera
summary: Delightful family holiday home, full of character and only 5 minutes to Cala Mondrago beach and nature park.
space: Location This charming farmhouse has been sympathetically restored to provide a comfortable family holiday home with all modern requirements including a large poolside BBQ casita with dining terraces and games area including table tennis. Located in the countryside midway between Santanyi and Alqueria Blanca so only 5 km from the beautiful sandy coves of Cala Mondrago and s`Amarador . The nature park of Es Trenc is also within a short drive.   Accommodation Dating back to the 16th century this characterful property has been completely renovated and is well furnished with many original features retained to provide a welcoming family holiday home. The 1.00m thick walls ensure a cooling natural ambience and benefits further with air conditioning in all bedrooms.  Accommodation is all on one floor and offers; *  Living room with Plasma TV, music system complimentary Wifi Internet connection and dining area *  Lounge with comfy seating area and access to the gardens and pool. *  Fitted kitc

name: Sa Tanqueta
summary: Welcome to this beautiful townhouse duplex, located in Calonge. It can accommodate 6 people + 1 extra.
space: The communal exteriors are beautiful and offer a 10 x 6 m chlorine pool with a depth ranging from 0.9 m to 1.8 m and a garden area. There is a private terrace on the ground floor and another terrace on the first floor with wonderful views over the Bay Cala D'Or. If you like to cook outside, you will find a BBQ there.  This property offers accommodation on four floors and 130 m2. It features three double bedrooms with A/C, two of them on the first floor and the third one on the second floor. One bedroom on the first floor has a bathroom en suite. In this property you will have access to a toilet on the ground floor and a bath with bath tub on the first floor. neighborhood_overview: Es Calonge is a small village belonging to Santanyi. It is located only 4 km away from Cala d'Or, the coastal holiday resort, belonging also to Santanyi. You will find there everything you might need during your stay. In the area there are magnificent beaches with crystal clear waters, as Cala d'Or, Cala Gran, Cala Llonga, Portopetro, etc.  For golf enthusiasts, in just 10 minutes drive, you can reach Vall d'Or Golf. For any kind of leasure, we recommend you to visit the city of Palma, situated 60 minutes by car, where you will find many shops, cinemas, bars, restaurants, pubs, theaters, water parks, etc.

host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Residence 'El Puerto 2' - Mallorca
summary: Beach - Bike - Golf - Yachting - Relax - Family 2 Schlafzimmer - 2 Bäder - Hochwertige Ausstattung
space: Die exklusiven Apartments verfügen über zwei Doppelschlafzimmer und zwei Bäder, eine in den Wohnraum offen intergrierte Küche, einen sehr grosszügigen Terassenbereich mit eigenem abgeschlossenen Gartenbereich. Mehrere Gemeinschaftspools innerhalb der Apartmentanlage 'El Puerto 2' laden zum Entspannen ein. Ein toller Panoramablick über Cala Dor und die Umgebung runden die Sache ab. Ideal para familias con niños que quieren pasear en bicicleta y disfrutar del sol y la tranquilidad de un lugar como Cala d´Or.   Supermercados, panaderias, retaurantes, tiendas, etc a 3 minutos en coche.  Tenis Club Cala d´Or 1 km.
notes: Se aceptan mascotas.
transit: En la zona de Cala d´Or podrán moverse caminando hasta cualquier lugar. No obstante dispone de servicio de bus y taxi y encontrarán muchas ofertas económicas para alquilar bicicletas.
access: Los huespedes tienen acceso a todas las zonas de la casa.
interaction: La entrada y la salida de los huespedes la realizaré yo mismo y el dia de salida vendré a despedirme.
house_rules: La entrada de los huéspedes es a la 16:00 horas y el dia de salida se ha de abandonar la casa a la 10:00 horas.

name: First line bungalow in Cala d'Or
summary: Este bungalow está en el mejor sitio que pueda imaginar en Cala d'Or. Disfrute de la mejor vista de la playa desde su terraza a 5 metros de la arena y el agua. Un pequeño paraíso.
space: Ninguna casa está más cerca de la playa que esta. Ideal para pasar las mejores vacaciones de sol y playa en Cala d'Or. Capacidad para 5 personas. Es una pequeña casa o bungalow individual construida entre pinos y a unos pocos metros de la arena de la playa. IDÍLICA!

host_about:
Myself, toguether with my wife Ivana and and some partners, we manage a holiday homes rental agency for fincas and villas in Mallorca. We rent more than 30 properties on the East and South of the island.

Quality is our main goal, offering nice houses on good locations, clean, well equipped and confortable. We always wellcome our guests personally, we explain them where they are and where they can find best restaurants, supermarkets, shops and entertainment places. We will also be 24 hours a day available by phone in case of emergency or that something is wrong with the property.

I was born in Mallorca into a farmer's family on a very traditional village called Porreres, but I had been living, studing and working in other European countries, so I am very open-minded, I speak many different languages and I understand the requirements of travelers when they are far away from home with their family. Me and my partners will try to make you feel at home and we will help you to discover this beautiful island called Mallorca.

name: Neu renoviertes Dorfhaus Casa Es Pontas mit Pool
summary: Liebevoll renoviertes Dorfhaus mit privatem Pool im Herzen von Santanyí Casa Es Pontas ist ein wunderschönes Dorfhaus in einer Seitenstraße des typisch-mallorquinischen Städtchens Santanyí. Das Haus wurde 2017 aufwendig renoviert und ist nun ein Juwel unter den Dorfhäusern. Es ist einerseits geprägt von den traditionellen Steinmauern, andererseits durch die exklusiv-moderne und dennoch gemütliche Einrichtung.  Mit dem Auto erreichen Sie in wenigen Minuten die schönsten Strände der Insel.
space: Den besten Einblick über die Insel, den Ort und das Haus bekommen Sie über unsere Homepage. Leider kann in diesem Rahmen keine URL angezeigt werden und wir würden Sie bitten, uns bei Interesse zu kontaktieren. Darüber hinaus haben wir einige nützliche und interessante Infos rund um das Haus im folgenden für Sie zusammengestellt. Das Haus bietet Ihnen die ideale Basis für Ihr perfektes Urlaubserlebnis. Zu Fuß sind Sie in nur wenigen Minuten im Ortszentrum des idyllischen Städtchens Santanyi mit schönen Geschäften, Bars und Restaurants sowie dem berühmten Wochenmarkt, der jeden Mittwoch und Samstag dort stattfindet. Mit dem Auto erreichen Sie in wenigen Minuten die schönsten Strände der Insel (z.B. Cala Santanyi - 3,9km, Cala Llombards - 5,8km, Cala Mondrago - 7,7km, Es Trenc - 16,7km) oder den malerischen Fischerhafen Cala Figuera (5,2km). Das Haus mit ca. 200m² bebauter Fläche besteht aus dem Haupthaus mit Wohn- und Essbereich, Küche, 2 Schlafzimmern mit Bädern en suite und Dachterrass

neighborhood_overview: Santanyí, die Stadt mit dem Namen des heiligen Lamms, liegt im Südosten Mallorcas. Es ist kaum mehr vorstellbar, dass die häufig noch sichtbare Stadtmauer um das Jahr 1500 zum Schutz vor Piraten erbaut worden ist. Die Besucher werden heute unter anderem von dem traditionell mallorquinischen Stadtbild und der Pfarrkirche Sant Andreu Apostól entzückt. In wenigen Autominuten sind von hier Mallorcas malerische Buchten und Strände erreichbar. EINKAUFEN Santanyí bietet eine Vielzahl an Einkaufsmöglichkeiten von diversen Supermärkten bis hin zu renommierten Kunstgalerien. Wochenmarkt Jeden Mittwoch und Samstag von 8 bis 13 Uhr findet rund um die Plaza Mayor (ca. 5 Minuten zu Fuß vom Casa Es Pontas) ein Wochenmarkt mit mallorquinischen Spezialitäten, frischem Obst und Gemüse sowie allerlei Textilien statt. Starten Sie bei einem leckeren Frühstück oder Brunch in einem der zahlreichen Lokale rund um den Marktplatz in den Tag - von dort lässt sich wunderbar das Marktgeschehen beobachten. Lokale B
transit: ANBINDUNG Flughafen Der Flughafen ist ca. 50 km von Santanyí entfernt. Mit dem Auto, das Sie bei einer der zahlreichen Autovermietungen direkt am Flughafen buchen können, brauchen Sie ca. 35 Minuten bis zum Casa Es Pontas.  Bus In Santanyí fahren mehrmals am Tag öffentliche Busse. Die wichtigsten Linien sind die 501 und 502, mit denen Sie bis nach Palma fahren können. Wenn Sie mit dem Bus zum/vom Flughafen fahren möchten, dann geht das nur mit einmal Umsteigen in Palma, an der Plaza Espanya. Die Linie 503 bringt Sie in den Nachbarort Cala Figuera. Fahrrad Santanyí und Umgebung lassen sich auch wunderbar mit dem Fahrrad erkunden. Im Casa Es Pontas stehen zwei Fahrräder zu Ihrer Verfügung bereit. Wenn Sie weitere Fahrräder ausleihen möchten, können Sie das im Nachbarort Cala Figuera bei Bike Total tun. Taxi Taxis Cala D´Or haben auch in Santanyí einen festen Stand. Taxipreise variieren ja nach Tag und Tageszeit.
house_rules: - Angemessene Nachtruhe-Zeiten berücksichtigen

name: Un pequeño paraiso en Mondragó 6pax
summary: Ideal para relajarse y disfrutar de la naturaleza (en medio del Parque Natural Mondragó) con la familia o amigos. Casa con mucho encanto, construida por mi madre: jardín, terrazas, + de 60 palmeras, piscina, barbacoa, etc. A 9 min de la playa
space: La casa forma parte de una finca de más de 10.000m2. Elementos mallorquines tradicionales se combinan a la perfección con las comodidades modernas para ofrecer confort a lo largo de todo el año.  Cuando aprieta el calor, ofrece el regalo de una piscina (de 140 a 190 cm de profundidad) La casa. En la planta baja: sala comedor con chimenea, cocina, dos dormitorios dobles (uno con 2 camas y el otro con cama de matrimonio),  cuarto de baño . Mediante una escalera de caracol se accede a un tercer dormitorio doble con ventanas que permiten observar el paisaje.  Toda la casa esta rodeada de jardines y terrazas. En la parte sur, gran porche con 2 mesas. Desde allí  por una escalera se sube a la azotea que ofrece vistas de 360 grados sobre el Parque Natural, lugar ideal para observar los cambios de luz y el cielo.  Delante de la puerta principal, hay otra terraza con una parra formando una pérgola y una mesa y sillas. Y desde la cocina se accede a la tercera terraza con un pozo En verano, cuand

neighborhood_overview: Las fincas de Sa Cova Foradada forman parte del Parc Natural de Mondrágo, situado en la costa sureste de Mallorca, en las marinas de Llevant, en el término municipal de Santanyí. Me pertenecen por herencia. Mi abuelo y la familia vivían de trabajarlas hasta los años 70 del siglo pasado. Los algarrobos y otros  arboles fueron plantados hace muchos años, las palmeras y el jardín fueron hechos por mi madre a principios de los 80. "Sa Cova Foradada"  esta situada muy cerca de la Alqueria Blanca y a unos tres kilómetros del pueblo de Santanyí. Muy cerca de cala Mondrago y del bello puerto de pescadores de Porto Petro. Cala D'Or esta a poca distancia donde se encuentran superficies comerciales y todo tipo de tiendas. PARQUE NATURAL DE MONDRAGÓ El Parque está calificado como Àrea Natural de Especial Interés (ANEI), y forma part de la Red Natura 2000 com a Zona de Especial Protección para  las Aves (ZEPA). El Parque está constituido por un mosaico de ambientes diferentes que le confieren una g
transit: En coche, pero también en bicicleta El parque ofrece itinerarios autoguiados: - Itinerario del mirador de sa Font de n'Alis - Itinerario de la vuelta a sa Guàrdia d'en Garrot - Itinerario de sa punta de ses Gatoves - Itinerario de s'Amarador
access: Jardín y piscina
house_rules: IMPORTATE:  Cerrar la barrera de acceso a la finca. Solamente disponen de llave los huéspedes y personal de mantenimiento. Apagar las luces al ir a dormir, sobretodo de terrazas y jardín. Las solares siempre quedan encendidas! Usar de manera responsable el agua. En Mallorca el agua es escasa La basura se deposita en bolsas en los contenedores situados cerca de la Residencia de Alqueria Blanca. Se practica recogida selectiva de vidrio (contenedor verde); papel (contenedor azul) y plástico y envases (contenedor amarillo); el resto se deposita en el gris

name: Sa Talaia Vella
summary: Landhaus nur 1000 Meter von der idyllischen Bucht von Cala Santanyi mit einem feinen Sandstrand.  Das Landhaus verfügt über 2 Schlafzimmer mit Einzelbetten und 1 Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett, 2 Bäder, eines mit Badewanne, Wohn- und Esszimmer mit  SAT - TV, sowie eine Küche.  Auf  beiden Seiten des Hauses finden Sie grosse überdachte Terrassen,  eine mit direktem Zugang zum grossen Pool. Sie finden ebenfalls einen Gartengrill, sodass Sie die warmen Abende im Freien geniessen können.

name: Villa Sunrise
summary: Villa Sunrise is a beautiful modern frontline villa with amazing views over the Cala of Santanyi.
space: The villa has a very convenient cut and is situated in a very quiet and prominent location of the small village of Cala Santanyi. The ground floor consists of large living room with terrace access, fully equipped kitchen, guest bathroom and two bedrooms, each with en suite bathroom. Upstairs is a living room with private patio access, and two additional bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom. Integrated into the building is a laundry room and a covered parking place. The property has air conditioning. The pool is the center of the beautiful garden. More informations and Price on request. The small bay with sandy beach is just 500 meters away. The village of Santanyi, known by the lovely weekly market, is only 5 minutes away by car and offers great shopping and a variety of bars and restaurants.

Cala Santanyí, one of the most beautiful coves in Majorca is at 40 kilometres from the Pa
neighborhood_overview: Cala Santanyí, one of the most beautiful coves in Majorca is at 40 kilometres from the Palma airport in the Soouth of the Island. Our hotel and its apartments nestle in the cove sitting directly on a beach of fine, white sand, surrounded by rocks, pine and palm trees. The villa is a few kilometres away from the picturesque and typical Majorcan village Santanyí and also very close to the romantic fishermen's port of Cala Figuera, Mondragó's Nature reserve, Cala Llombards and the small, idyllic cove of s'Almonia. Santanyí's municipal area covers 126km² and has more than 48 km of coastline. Calm sandy coves of clear water alternate with romantic fishermen's ports. A network of small paths allows you to go on a variety of long treks and short excursions by bicycle. At any time of the year, the gentle climate, the sun, the sea and the beauty of the landscape offer many possibilities for you to rest and relax, as well as to enjoy the island and its people. No matter whether you are traveling

summary: Finca de 16.000 m², con un bonito chalet moderno de 200 m². Contiene dos plantas, con mucha luz, dispone de 4 habitaciones una de ellas con una pequeña terraza privada, un gran salón-comedor, dos baños, una coladuría  y una cocina. Una terraza de 72 m² con un porche cubierto de 50 m² , una preciosa piscina con terraza y jardín, finalmente contiene un garaje con un baño.

neighborhood_overview: The villa is located just 3 km from the village of Santanyí, a traditional village with old town where you will find restaurants of all styles, supermarkets and shops of all kinds. Also a large market, Wednesdays and Saturdays, considered one of the best markets of Mallorca. Coast / Beach: The chalet is only 15 min. the beaches of Cala Mondragó Natural Park (Cala Mondragó and S'Amarador), 10 min. Cala Santanyí Beach, with the spectacular "Pontàs" and 30 min. the great beach "Es Trenc". 15 km may also find the area of Cala d'Or, which is surrounded by 7 beautiful beaches: Cala Serena, Cala Ferrera, Cala Gran, Cala Esmeralda, Cala Petita Caló des Pou and Es Forti. Only 8 km you will find the ancient and picturesque fishing port of Cala Figuera, where you can find restaurants at first sea line. Also 10 km will find the beautiful port of Porto Petro. Golf: The prestigious Club de Golf Vall d'Or 18 holes, is 15 km away. However, the island offers many golf courses, all within a distance abo
transit: Palma airport is distant 45 minutes. You can rent cars, which we recommend;  A taxi ride will cost approx. 65 € or, in the case of the night and holidays, 75 €.
house_rules: -Cuidar el mobiliario y todo en general, ya que el chalet es nuevo a estrenar. Es una construcción nueva del año 2015.
host_about: Somos una familia, con un bonito chalet nuevo a extrenar, estamos dispuestos a alquilarlo, está situado enmedio de la naturaleza, sin ruidos i con unas preciosas vistas a los pueblos del sur de mallorca i al Parque Natural de Cabrera.

name: Sanchez
summary: Set in a quiet location and within a few minutes pleasant stroll along pine scented pathways to the beautiful s'Amarador sandy beach.
space: Location Set in an area of outstanding natural beauty in Mondrago National Park in a very quiet and peaceful location only five minutes gentle stroll along pine scented pathways to s'Amarador beach. There are no beach side restaurants although sometimes during peak season a small tapas bar opens. This naturally protected beach has a backdrop of Pine trees further enabling you to enjoy the natural unspoilt beauty of s'Amarador and even in high season this is normally a haven of peace.  Many pleasant walks are nearby through the Pine forest and along the dramatic rugged coastline. Turquoise crystal clear waters are ideal for swimming and the gently sloping sandy beach is excellent for children. A few shaded picnic areas are dotted around the cove and are ideal for relaxed lunches. From this beach is a path along one side of the cove with an inviting 10 minute walk leading to the stunning Cala Mondrago beach with two beach side restaurants. Here you can also hire pedal boats. Location Set in an area of outstanding natural beauty in Mondrago National Park in a very quiet and peaceful location only five minutes gentle stroll along pine scented pathways to s'Amarador beach. There are no beach side restaurants although sometimes during peak season a small tapas bar opens. This naturally protected beach has a backdrop of Pine trees further enabling you to enjoy the natural unspoilt beauty of s'Amarador and even in high season this is normally a haven of peace.  Many pleasant walks are nearby through the Pine forest and along the dramatic rugged coastline. Turquoise crystal clear waters are ideal for swimming and the gently sloping sandy beach is excellent for children. A few shaded picnic areas are dotted around the cove and are ideal for relaxed lunches. From this beach is a path along one side of the cove with an inviting 10

neighborhood_overview: Cala d'Or is a holiday resort on the east coast of Majorca consisting of three principal areas: the town centre of Cala d'Or, Cala Egos and Cala Ferrera. It offers many small, fine sandy beaches including Cala Gran, Cala d'Or, Cala Egos, Cala Es Forti, Cala Serena and Cala Esmeralda A mini 'road train' regularly runs for holidaymakers between different parts of the resort and the beaches. The town centre is very lively in the summer months but much more low key than the larger and more populated resorts in Majorca. The pedestrianised area offers a variety of shops, bars, and restaurants and a wide selection of international cuisine. Also popular is the marina area which welcomes exclusive yachts and chartered boats throughout the year, offering some of the best protection from storms in the whole of Majorca, although the entrance can be very tight for turning. The marina is also near restaurants and bars suiting most European cultures. The majority of buildings in Cala d'Or are painted
notes: close to natural reserve Cala Mondrago, the lovely Cala sa Nau beach with live music, the Cala d' Or golfcourse and more.

name: Charmanter Bungalow am Meer
summary: Am Rande einer kleinen Siedlung, fast direkt an der Küste, liegt unser im maritimen Stil eingerichteter Bungalow.  Es sind nur 50m zu den imposanten Steilklippen, einer atemberaubenden Kulisse, am Rande des Naturparks Mondragó. Zu den Stränden S'Amarador und Mondragó sind es nur einige hundert Meter, 5 Autominuten. Nette Bars und Restaurants gibt es im nahegelegenen Cala Figuera. In Santanyi findet Mittwoch und Samstags ein toller Markt statt.
space: Der Bungalow ist sehr gepflegt und mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet. Es gibt viele nette Sitz - und Liegemöglichkeiten: Hier kann man den Tag herrlich ausklingen lassen. Die Ruhe und die Luft, die immer ein wenig nach Meer duftet, sind umwerfend. Die Schlafzimmer haben große Betten: 1 Schlafzimmer mit durchgehender Matratze 180cm x 200cm 1 Schlafzimmer mit 2 sep. Betten, die auf Anfrage zusammengestellt werden können mit 90cm x 200cm. 1 Badezimmer mit Dusche, WC/Bidet und 1 sep. Toilette. Waschmaschine. Das Haus hat in fast allen Räumen Klimaanlage.

name: FRONTET
summary: Welcome to this modern apartment for 4 people in Portopetro, a lovely village at the east of the island.
space: This cute apartment is decorated with a Mediterranean and unique style. It has a comfortable gas kitchen- dining room with all the necessary amenities to prepare nice meals. The laundry room, equipped with washing machine, iron and iron board is located in a little courtyard. It disposes of two bedrooms, one with a double bed and another one with two single beds. There is a bathroom with a shower. You will find air conditioning at the hallway, and if you leave the doors open, it will nicely refresh the other rooms. If you travel with your baby, we will provide you a cot and a high chair. Note: This property’s rent is carried out based on the Spanish legislation, specifically Law 29/1994 of 24 November on urban leases. For this reason, the property will be available for seasonal use. In this contract the lessee will not be offered any kind of tourist services. This contract only consists of the cession of the use and enjoyment of the property.  Pets are not allowed. neighborhood_overview: Portopetro fishing village is located at the oriental area of Majorca island, and it has a typical Mediterranean atmosphere. You will find a fantastic range of the best restaurants that offer fresh fish and seafood. Around this area you will be able to discover idyllic beaches, like Mondragó natural park with two sand beaches, the rock Amarador beach, and the little sand coves Caló des Moro and Caló des Borgit. If you have a car, you can drive to Es Trenc and Ses Covetes.

interaction: Si tiene preguntas durante su estancia no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros por teléfono o mail.
host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Vista Hermosa-Apartment
summary: 1 Bedroom (with bathroom) opens to the big, mindblowing terrace overlooking the sea, the beach and the harbor. Spend your afternoons watching the sailing ships coming back to port. The kitchen opens to the living room & to the terrace. Ocean view. Seaside. The closest beach is less than 5 minutes walk away. Plenty of restaurants and nightlife at walking distance.
space: 1-Bedroom apartment with amazing views. Fall asleep with the sound of the waves!  Kitchen, bathroom with bathtub, living room and big terrace. Perfect for couples or families with small children. Access to the beach only 3 minutes away. Bikers- friendly, baby- friendly.

neighborhood_overview: Vista Hermosa like the majority of buildings in Cala d'Or is painted in the traditional Mediterranean white Ibicencan style. Situated in a calm neighborhood between two Cala´s or Sea-inlets, the house is just on the rocks.  The beach is 5 minutes away by walk and the center of the small town only 7 minutes away. Perfect to have lunch or dinner out and grab a few drinks.
notes: Mis abuelos viven durante la mitad del año en el piso de abajo del apartamento. Son una pareja muy tranquila y están dispuestos a ayudar en cualquier momento si surge un inconveniente.
transit: Public transport is quite deficient in Mallorca. Not recomended, but possible. The best way to explore the whole island is to rent a car or motorcycle.

host_about: My name is Emma and I am the 7th of 9 grandchildren. My grandparents own the whole house and have trusted me with the work of renting the upper floor, an individual apartment. They are a calm, interesting couple. He is german and she is from the Canary Islands, but spend half of the year in Madrid and half in Vista Hermosa. I am happy to answer any questions and help you as far as I can, so do not hesitate in contacting me!

name: Beach is 3' walk away. Fully renovated Aug 2016!
summary: A completely renovated (Aug 2016) 2-bedroom apartment in Cala d'Or, one of Majorca's finest destinations, with the beach at only 3 minutes walking away. Excellent location: right in the city center Cala d’Or with shops, rent-a-car, bars and restaurant are all walking distance. Strict local regulations about noise and soundproofing windows will guarantee you a good rest. Our apartment is a perfect solution for those who don't like crowded hotels and are looking for greater autonomy and privacy
space: The apartment has two bedrooms (one very spacious and second with bunk bed), and a very large space with kitchen (with island), dining room and lounge. Inside everything is new starting with the soil, electrical installation, bathroom, windows and even furniture. Comfortable for a family with up to 2 children The location is excellent: right in the center of Cala d'Or. A step away from the shopping and dining and a three minute walk from the main beach (Cala Gran) The other, called Cala d'Or propiemente, is about 5 minutes. Strict regulations about noise in the population and soundproofing guarantee a good rest. For breakfast, you can buy anything at the grocery store across the street (they have a very extensive hours) or down to the cafeteria Neptuno excellent quality. You have everything at hand: a company car hire, tobacconist, cafes, restaurants, clothing stores ... And the pristine beach. The apartment is a perfect solution for those who want to get away from the crowd of a hotel
description: A completely renovated (Aug 2016) 2-bedroom apartment in Cala d'Or, one of Majorca's finest destinations, with the beach at only 3 minutes walking away. Excellent location: right in the city center Cala d’Or with shops, rent-a-car, bars and restaurant are all walking distance. Strict local regulations about noise and soundproofing windows will guarantee you a good rest. Our apartment is a perfect solution for those who don't like crowded hotels and are looking for greater autonomy and privacy The apartment has two bedrooms (one very spacious and second with bunk bed), and a very large space with kitchen (with island), dining room and lounge. Inside everything is new starting with the soil, electrical installation, bathroom, windows and even furniture. Comfortable for a family with up to 2 children The location is excellent: right in the center of Cala d'Or. A step away from the shopping and dining and a three minute walk from the main beach (Cala Gran) The other, called Cala d'Or propi
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in one of the best Majorca's spots: Cala d'Or. It is very close to the beach (you can walk there wearing your swimsuit, shirt and bringing a towel on your shoulder), with all the services you could imagine at your disposal without the discomforts of living in the pedestrian area (where the bars and restaurants are) but very close to them. The apartment is located right in the center. In front of a 4 star hotel "adults only". You can wander around dozens of shops, eat in many restaurants in all price and end the night in a magnificent terrace sipping an ice cream. If you travel outside peak season, you will feel very comfortable because in the neighborhood there is local life. It is a good place to pause in the hectic city life.
notes: If traveling with children aged 12 and 18, you can introduce them to fishing. It is very simple: 3 mins walking away you will find a shop selling everything you need (very cheap) and you can fish from the rocks where delicious fish abound. It is a good alternative entertainment: simple and cheap. If what you want is something more substantial, you can walk to the marina and rent a boat, hire a yacht ride or take a charter fishing.
transit: You can get to Cala d'Or either by public transportation or by hiring a taxi. To explore the island you may want to rent a car or a motorbike. However, if you just want to walk, you can get to awesome places... and we strongly recommend you to take a walk around as soon as you get to Cala d'Or!
access: We offer a clean, functional and cozy apartment. Our goal is to get you coming back next year!
interaction: In case we are not there in Mallorca to welcome you at your arrival, you will be able to pick up the keys from the Neptuno's cafè, right in front of the apartment. They are open from 8am.
host_about:
Somos Jordi y Núria, padres de 2 niños. Somos profesores de universidad y de instituto. 
Hemos reformado completamente un piso propiedad de la familia para compartirlo con huéspedes de todo el mundo. Hemos elegido con cuidado los materiales y le hemos puesto todo el cariño del mundo.
Nos encanta viajar por todas partes, integrándonos en la cultura local.

Enamorados de Mallorca desde hace 40 años, os podemos ayudar a conocerla algo mas, no sólo sus playas sino también su gastronomía, sus costumbres y sus pueblos de interior. Si quereis información, no dudes en mandarme un mail!

name: Apartment 'Ernesto' next to beach
summary: Beautiful duplex (ground and 1st floor) sea frontline. 5 min walk to beach. Large private terrace and stunning views. Quiet and family orientated complex, shared pool, car parking secure area, solariums and ladders by the rocks for sea swimming. WIFI
space: The apartment was recently  refurbished to very high standards. It is a duplex and the two floors are jointed by a staircase. Lower floor: entrance to the apartment, open plan kitchen, dining room, and lounge leading to a large private terrace/patio. The terrace/patio includes garden furniture (dining table and chairs, and two sun beds) and spectacular views of the bay and open sea. There is a fold up single bed in the lounge. Upper floor: 2 bedrooms with a double bed each, 2 bathrooms: both with spacious shower cabins and the en-suite with two washbasins. A cot is also available for babies. Air conditioning warm/cool units in lower floor and master bedroom upstairs. There is plenty of wardrobe/drawer space to store your clothes. All windows have shutters.  WIFI The kitchen has got all you need. Three TVs: lounge and the two bedrooms. DVD/CD player in the lounge. The apartment is non-smoking but you are welcome to smoke outside in the terrace. Sorry we do not accept pets. Linen and tow

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right between two sand beaches: Cala Ferrera and Cala Esmeralda. Only a 5 min walk each. Cala Ferrera and Cala d' Or are two wonderful resorts with entertainment for the whole family. It is an appropriate place for both a relaxing or a more active holiday . The apartment is at the end of a quiet street but, at the same time, it has all kinds of amenities within walking distance : supermarket, shops, restaurants, chemist, health center ... You can reach the center of Cala d' Or walking in 10-15 minutes. This is a walk through pleasant streets full of shops, restaurants, children amenities, etc. Next to Cala d'Or you will find Cala d'Or Marina, a wonderful place for views, to walk around and try any of their wonderful restaurants. Just 15 minutes by car you will find a great 18-hole golf course : Vall d'Or Golf .
transit: Palma Airport is 50 minutes away by car. At the airport there are taxis, buses and several car rental agencies. The port of Palma 60 min drive. Buses travel to anywhere on the island.
access: The complex is very quiet and familiar. No traffic to worry about. It is surrounded by well maintained gardens . Shared pool and next to it a nice area on the rocks for sunbathing and ladders to swim in the sea. Reception Office and parking area with security barrier.
interaction: There will be a local contact available 24 hours. I will be available via telephone. The Reception Office is open from Easter until the end of October.
house_rules: The apartment is non-smoking but you are welcome to smoke outside in the terrace. Sorry we do not accept pets. Linen and towels are provided however beach towels are not supplied.

name: Chalet Karine Cala Mondrago
summary: El chalet esta en una muy pequeña zona residencial dentro del parque natural Mondrago. Zona muy tranquila. La playa más cercana es Cala Mondrago a unos 900 metros desde la casa. Tiene un pequeño jardin muy agradable para desayunar y cenar con una barbacoa. 5 dormitorios estan en la planta baja con 2 baños y en la primera planta con entrada independiente hay un dormitorio doble muy amplio con un baño en suite.  Lugares de interés: Cala Santanyi, Cala Figuera, Parque natural Mondragon, la playa.

name: Apartment in Porto Petro, Mallorca
space: Our 100 m2, 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apt comes with a large terrace with a gorgeous view, overlooking the quiet and picture-perfect port of Portopetro, in a small, gated community of 18 apartments, with swimming pool and 2 tennis courts. It's walking distance to a few excellent restaurants (we've been to all of them and can recommend in detail!), beaches, and the beautiful Mondrago National Park, where you can go hiking, explore nature and the park beaches. In Portopetro you will also find a scuba diving school and a sailing and rowing school. It's also near the picturesque towns of Santanyi and Felanitx, which have lovely street markets once a week and even more restaurants. It's an 8' drive to Cala d'Or -- close enough for easy access to large supermarkets, shops, bakeries, butchers, pharmacies, doctors, and a luxurious 5-star marina, and yet far enough to avoid the loud crowds and the hustle and bustle of the active nightlife there if you just want a quiet evening by the terrace with a

name: Son Garrot - 0434
summary: Aquest preciós habitatge de 80 m² situat al camí de Son Garrot, al terme municipal de Santanyí i molt a prop d'un dels  paradisos més emblemàtics de Mallorca, el Parc Natural de Mondragó. te una capacitat per a 4 persones.
space: És un habitatge reformat recentment sobre una antiga caseta típica rural, que gaudeix de vistes sobre el camp.  És una casa perfectament integrada dins l’entorn, i de respecte màxim amb l’entorn al qual es troba.  Tot la seva instal•lació elèctrica s’alimenta amb energia solar i ha estat decorada amb tota mena de detalls que us faran sentir com a casa. Allotjament ideal per a famílies i grups d’amics, amb dues habitacions, una d’elles a la planta baixa amb  un  llit de matrimoni, i una altra a la primera planta amb un altre llit de matrimoni.  Compta amb un bany complet i ben equipat, el qual te dues portes, una d’elles dona directament a la habitació de la planta baixa, i l’altra a la zona de menjador i dona servei a la resta de la casa. Disposa d'una cuina dotada de tots els elements i aparells necessaris per a que hi pugueu cuinar amb tota comoditat i una zona menjador annexa a la cuina on gaudir còmodament dels àpats elaborats.  També disposa d’un fabulós saló amb sofàs per a relax
description: The house and its facilities are totally private. We’ll leave bed linen and bath towels for you (beach towels are not available). If you have questions during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time through email or phone.
neighborhood_overview: La casa queda a només 1,5 km de Santanyí, on podreu trobar tot el que pugueu necessitar durant la vostra estada: supermercat, centre mèdic, farmàcia, bars, restaurants, botigues, etc. És un poble amb un ambient especial, on s’hi barreja perfectament l’ambient tradicional dels pobles de Mallorca i l’ambient modern que li aporten tots els visitants que acull d’arreu del mon.  Amb el teu cotxe pots arribar en 20 minuts a la platges de sorra blanca d'Es Trenc, , o a la Colònia de Sant Jordi. Aquest allotjament té l’avantatge d'estar a 50 minuts de Palma en cotxe on s'hi poder realitzar visites turístiques, passejades culturals o Shopping. A manco de 10 km podeu trobar-hi Cala d’Or i la seva agitada vida nocturna i gran oferta d’activitats d’oci.
transit: Distàncies: Platja de sorra, Cala Mondragó: 5,3 km Banc, supermercat, restaurants, bars, farmàcia... (Santanyí): 1,5 km Aeroport: 48 km Hospital públic (Manacor): 37 km Camp de golf (Vall d'Or): 13,5 km Estació de tren (Manacor): 37 km Palma de Mallorca (centre): 53 km

interaction: If you have questions during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time through email or phone.

host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Casa familiar en Cala d'Or
summary: Atractiva casa de campo de 250 m2 ubicada en un entorno tranquilo en Cala d'Or. Equipamiento moderno, gran piscina y barbacoa. Ideal para unas vacaciones en familia o con amigos. Muy cerca de todas las playas del sur de la isla.
space: En la planta baja hay un amplio comedor con una confortable sala de estar y una luminosa puerta que da acceso al jardín, un patio cubierto y las terrazas junto a la piscina y la barbacoa. La cocina dispone de horno eléctrico, microondas, lavavajilas, cafetera, frigorífico y congelador. Junto a ella está la zona de lavandería donde hay una lavadora y una secadora. Tres habitaciones dobles con dos camas. Una de ellas con baño separado y las otras dos con baño en suite. Todas con acceso directo al jardín. En la planta superior está la habitación principal con cama doble, baño en suite y balcón privado con fantásticas vistas a la piscina y los alrededores. Hay una segunda terraza panorámica a la que se accede por separado. La parcela donde se levanta la casa tiene una extensión de 8.900 m2 y en ella hay zonas de césped, plantas de lavanda, almendros, limoneros y otros árboles mediterráneos.

neighborhood_overview: La casa se encuentra en un entorno tranquilo y natural cerca de Cala d'Or. Las bonitas playas del sureste de la isla, así como los restaurantes, comercios y lugares de interés de Cala d'Or están a tan solo unos minutos en coche.
notes: Check-in sólo los sábados. Posibilidad de un huésped extra en cama plegable. Personas con movilidad reducida/carritos de bebé: Rampa de acceso a la casa y a la zona piscina.
transit: Es recomendable tener un coche de alquiler.
access: Caja fuerte, sábanas y toallas, toallas de piscina/playa, silla y cuna de bebé.
interaction: Unos días antes de la llegada enviamos una explicación detallada de cómo llegar a la casa y otras informaciones de interés. Estamos disponibles las 24 horas del día a través de nuestro teléfono móvil.
house_rules: Esperamos un comportamiento adecuado por parte de nuestros huéspedes, especialmente en las casas ubicadas en zonas tranquilas. Si los clientes tienen algún problema o necesitan más información, rogamos se pongan en contacto con nosotros lo antes posible.
host_about:
Más de 10 años de experiencia en el mercado de alquiler vacacional, cientos de reservas atendidas, disponemos de casas en las mejores zonas de la isla, Valldemossa, Deyá, Estallenchs, Porto Colom, Pollensa...

Contáctenos para cualquier consulta, seguro que podremos ayudarle.

name: S'Eriçó cosy villa private pool&BBQ en Mondragó
summary: Encantadora y espaciosa casa muy luminosa situada en el Parque Natural de Mondragó a tan sólo 5 minutos de la playa. Esta acogedora casa cuenta con 4 dormitorios, 2 baños completos, una gran cocina-comedor, un amplio salón, una piscina privada, terrazas y jardín.
space: La cocina, muy amplia y totalmente equipada, da directamente a la terraza exterior donde podrá disfrutar de sus comidas debajo del porche. Los baños son con ducha o bañera, ropa de baño y secador de pelo. En el exterior, podrá disfrutar de la piscina privada, relajarse en las tumbonas o preparar una barbacoa para una buena cena veraniega. A unos 5 minutos se situan unas de las playas más bonitas de la isla, con su arena fina y sus aguas turquesas, S'Amarador y Cala Mondragó. A tan sólo 5 kilómetros está el emblemático pueblo de Santanyi con su tradicional mercado y donde encontrará numerosas tiendas, restaurantes, bares... En el tradicional puerto pesquero de Cala Figuera, situado a unos 2 kilómetros, disfrutará de un bonito paseo por las barcas o de una buena cena al lado del mar.

En el tradicional puerto pesquero de Cala Figuera, situado a unos 2 kilómetros, disfrutará de un bonito p
house_rules: ECO-TAX: Este impuesto de turismo del Govern Balear entró en vigor en Julio 2016. A su llegada, todos los huéspedes mayores de 16 años tendrán que abonar  este impuesto de turismo. En temporada alta (entre el 1 de mayo y el 31 de octubre) es de 1€ por persona y por día. En temporada baja (entre el 1 de noviembre y el 30 de abril) es de 0,50€ por persona y por día.

name: Lovely apartment in a family-friendly complex.
summary: A lovely apartment in Cala Egos, close to Cala D'Or with wifi - and sited in a secure, gated, peaceful & relaxing location with beautiful gardens and with beaches & all facilities within very easy walking distance (2-5 minutes). This is our home. It's been very well maintained, like the rest of the complex, so it's not a basic rental apartment. Olympic-size swimming pool, Jacuzzi and children's pool.  An on-site bistro offers snacks, light meals, a bar, wifi, DVD rental, TV, etc.
space: This is our home. It's been very well maintained, like the rest of the complex, so it's not a basic rental apartment.  The property itself is a nicely furnished, spacious (1100 square ft) a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom property on a small, exclusive and sought-after gated community, with plenty of facilities, such as lush gardens, Olympic-size swimming pool, jacuzzi, waterfalls, kiddies pool and a not-for-profit bar/cafe.  The huge range locally of beautiful quiet beaches, water sports, attractions, shopping, restaurants and bars is unparalleled and offers entertainment for all ages.  We ensure your home is always in good condition for your stay and our local team is available for any concerns you may have. New for 2016 - high definition flatscreen TV, HD satellite receiver and Blu-ray/DVD player.
description: A lovely apartment in Cala Egos, close to Cala D'Or with wifi - and sited in a secure, gated, peaceful & relaxing location with beautiful gardens and with beaches & all facilities within very easy walking distance (2-5 minutes). This is our home. It's been very well maintained, like the rest of the complex, so it's not a basic rental apartment. Olympic-size swimming pool, Jacuzzi and children's pool.  An on-site bistro offers snacks, light meals, a bar, wifi, DVD rental, TV, etc. This is our home. It's been very well maintained, like the rest of the complex, so it's not a basic rental apartment.  The property itself is a nicely furnished, spacious (1100 square ft) a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom property on a small, exclusive and sought-after gated community, with plenty of facilities, such as lush gardens, Olympic-size swimming pool, jacuzzi, waterfalls, kiddies pool and a not-for-profit bar/cafe.  The huge range locally of beautiful quiet beaches, water sports, attractions, shopping, restaur
neighborhood_overview: There is a huge range locally of beautiful coves, waterfront villages, quiet beaches, water sports, attractions, shopping, restaurants and bars is unparalleled and offers entertainment for all ages.  The apartment is only a 10 minute walk to Cala d'Or marina (2 minutes by car, or 10 minutes on the road train). The beautiful Vall D'Or golf course is an easy 10 min drive. This is an 18 hole course with excellent fairways and greens. It has some stunning sea views. The clubhouse is very well equipped with a large bar/restaurant area and lovely big sun terrace overlooking the course, with the sea behind. It is the perfect setting for a relaxing drink after your round. Club hire, trolley & buggy hire are available. There is also a shop, driving range and putting green. The course is open 12 months of the year. Booking is advisable during the busier months. The Calonge Golf Club is about a 15 minute drive.  You can also play golf and/or take lessons at Robinsons in Cala Ferrera. Apart from g
notes: There is plenty of parking.
transit: Just 45 minutes travel time to Palma de Mallorca airport. Approximately 65€ in a taxi, depending on time of year.  A taxi can also be arranged with a reliable local driver who speaks good English and other languages.  The Road Train, which goes regularly to Cala D'Or and to the Cala Mondrago beaches & national park, stops just 4 mins walk away. Location, location, location! 5 mins walk to beaches and Cala Egos shopping centre, restaurants & bars, 2km to Cala D'Or Marina with fabulous restaurants and shops - less than 3km to Cala D'Or centre, nightlife and beaches. Cala Mondrago beach and nature reserve are about 7km. Road-train available to many destinations inc Mondrago. Waterpark 30 mins drive. Caves of Drach 30 mins drive. San Salvador monastry 20 mins drive. The markets in Santanyi and Felantix can be reached with a 20 min drive.
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment and terrace. You will also have use of the gardens, sun loungers, swimming pools and bistro.
interaction: Michelle, our English housekeeper will be on hand if you need any help.
house_rules: Bookings of less than five days will incur a cleaning & laundry charge of €80. There are some simple house rules laid out in the Guest Folder (available on request). You will need your own beach towels to use the sunbeds outside around the pool.

name: Son Salom - 0521
summary: Charming villa in Santanyí, near the stunning Mondragó Natural Park. It is ideal for a family who want a holiday surrounded by nature.
space: This cosy villa has a full bathroom and two bedrooms: the main room has a double bed, a little dressing room sand a toilet; the second bedroom has two single beds. The living room is very well decorated and will make you feel at home while relaxing on the comfy sofas. In the same area you will find the well equipped open kitchen and a dining table. The exterior are beautiful: there are furnished porches where you can spend summer evenings, a BBQ and different areas where you will be able to sunbathe. At the plot there is space to park up to 6 cars. The house is located in a 35000 m2 plot in a is very quiet area. It is surrounded by tree lands and rural paths where you will enjoy to take some strolls or ride your bicycle.

host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: PEDRASSA PETITA 2
summary: This nice apartment with communal pool and close to the sea is located in Cala Santanyí and offers accommodation for 6 people.
space: The well-kept, communal exteriors features a chlorine, 11m x 10m chlorine pool with a depth ranging from 1.7m to 1.8m, a children's pool with a depth of 0.7m, a barbecue zone, a laundry and an exterior shower. name: PRIMER PISO EN APARTAMENTOS VAIXELL
summary: Apartamentos preciosos de nueva construcción situado a 50 metros de Marina Cala d'Or.
space: Apartamentos preciosos de nueva construcción situado a 50 metros de Marina Cala d'Or. Flamante nueva construcción, complejo de 3 apartamentos con piscina y jardín. Situado en una excelente ubicación, a solo 50m de la lujosa Marina de Cala d’Or, y a 5 minutos de la zona comercial con gran cantidad de restaurantes, bares, pubs, souvenirs, etc., y cerca de la playa. Los apartamentos disponen de una gran terraza privada donde puede relajarse y disfrutar de las vistas del puerto deportivo y el clima de Mallorca. El interior de los apartamentos, son de diseño moderno y constan de un amplio salón-comedor con cocina americana totalmente equipada, 2 dormitorios (1 con cama de matrimonio y 1 con 2 camas individuales), y un baño. Están equipados con aire acondicionado y disponen de un bonito jardín comunitario con piscina y ducha. neighborhood_overview: Los apartamentos están situados tan sólo a 50 metros de la Marina de Cala d’Or, con restaurantes, bares y boutiques. El supermercado más próximo también está a 50 metros a pie, de la propiedad. A través de un fabuloso paseo por la Marina, llegará al centro de Cala d’Or. En el camino encontrará una bolera, tiendas de todo tipo, canchas de tenis, pubs, autobús público, pequeño tren turístico,… Costa / Playa: Cala d’Or está rodeado por 7 hermosas playas: Cala Serena, Cala Ferrera, Cala Gran, Cala Esmeralda, Cala Petita, Caló des Pou y Es Fortí. La más cercana a la propiedad es Caló des Pou y se encuentra a 5 minutos a pie. Golf: El prestigioso Club de Golf, Vall d’Or, de 18 hoyos, se encuentra a 10km de distancia. No obstante, la isla ofrece gran cantidad de campos de golf, todos ellos a una distancia alrededor de 45 minutos en coche. Vacaciones: En la zona del apartamento, hay gran variedad de ofertas de todo tipo de deportes y actividades para toda la familia: golf, tenis, submarinismo,
transit: El aeropuerto de Palma, está distante 45 minutos en automóvil. Se pueden alquilar coches, cosa que le recomendamos; consúltelo con nosotros. Un viaje en taxi le costará aprox. 65€ o, en el caso de la noche y festivos, 75€.

name: Casa Luna, a hidden paradise!
summary: Casa Luna offers two rooms with shared facilities, that can be rented separately. Breakfast is not included. Casa Luna is self catered, you cabn prepare your own meals in the kitchen.  Entering through our patio you will discover a hidden paradise where you can relax on the rooftop terrace and in the lush backyard!
space: We have a beautiful house from 1870, right in the village. With a nice patio, a beautiful backyard and close to nature parks, breathtaking  beaches (10. Min), golf courts and picturesque villages. The B&B is situated  only 40 minutes from the capital Palma, a beautiful city with lots of attractions and nice little shops and bursting with art and culture ( The Cathedral!). Breakfast is self-service based. In the small kitchen you will find every morning fresh bread rolls, yoghurt, fruits, cheese, coffee and tea. You can enjoy breakfast  in the patio or in the backyard. As much as possible we use organic products from the island. After breakfast, guests can go out and make trips by car or on a bike or take a hike in the nearby nature reserves, or to various local markets and other cultural activities ( water sports, golf, etc.) in the area. Of course we can give advice on various walks, sights, markets, fine restaurants and excursions.  The B & B offers   WIFI and games, books, leaflets

With a nice patio, a beautiful backyard and close to nature parks, breathtaking  beaches (10. Min), golf courts and picturesque villages. The B&B is situated  only 40 minutes from the capital Palma, a beautiful city with lots of attractions and nice little shops and bursting with art and culture ( The Cathedral!). Breakfast is self-service based. In the small kitchen you will find every morning fresh bread rolls, yoghurt, fruits, cheese, coffee and tea. You can enjoy breakfast  in the patio or in the backyard. As much as possible we use organic products from the island. After breakfast, guests can go out and make tri
neighborhood_overview: Santanyí is a small, picturesque village in the southeast of Mallorca and is part of the Spanish archipelago of the Balearic Islands. Mallorca has a mild climate, with warm summers and mild winters. Our house dates from 1870 and is situated in the village. The B&B is situated within walking distance of the heart of the old town, with a cozy village square, surrounded by ancient walls. On the square stands the 18th century church of Saint Andreu containing an organ from 1762, which is specially made for the Santo Domingo church in Palma by the Majorcan organ builder Jordi Bosch. In the narrow streets of the center you will find many outdoor cafes, boutiques and art shops. In the immediate vicinity there are around 150 archaeological sites of the talayotic culture. These are the original inhabitants of Mallorca and they built talayots (large mountains of stone). There are also caves from this period. Santanyi is close to many beautiful nature parks , beautiful beaches and picturesque vil
notes: Casa Luna is self catered, in the small kitchen you will find every thing you need to prepare your own meals.
transit: There are several companies offering flights to Mallorca for reasonable prices: Ryan Air, Vueling, Air Berlin, Transavia etc. Especially between March and November. Santanyi is easily accessible by public transport and also offers easy access to other cities from the village.  When you come from the airport by car, just follow the signs to Santanyí. If you are entering the village you come to a roundabout and there you follow the road (on  your left a Repsol petrol station) to the direction of Colonia Sant Jordi. The second street to the right (on the corner you’ll find Expert store ).This is Carrer Es Velar.  Casa Luna is at number 10. Here you can park your car for free everywhere, but we do not have a private car park. If you do not have your own transportation, we offer transfers ( 35€ one way).
access: To a shared kitchen, where small salads and cold meals can be prepared. There is  cooking possibility. To a shared bathroom with rainshower.
interaction: Casa Luna is located in the backyard of our house. Guests have to walk through our patio to enter the guesthouse. However, the backyard and the rooftop terrace are reserved for our guests and here they can enjoy  a lot of privacy. The B&B is situated in a separate building and is not part of our living space. However, we are easy to find if you have any questions or in need of advice about hiking trips, attractions, markets, fine restaurants and other attractions.
house_rules: Check in at 14.00, check out at 10.30
host_about:
I live together with my husband  In Mallorca for 3 years now. We love living here!
My husband runs a sound studio and I have a B&B and a small catering company.
We made our dream come true by living here, come and see why!

name: Herrliche Finca & Pool bei Santanyi
summary: Ruhige Alleinlage auf großem Grundstück mit mit angrenzender Mandelbaumplantage. 2015 renoviert. Großer Pool, sichtgeschützt, Privatsphäre! 3 Schlafzimmer, 2 Bäder, 6 (+2 ) Personen, zuzüglich Babybett
space: Ruhige Alleinlage auf großem Grundstück, großer Pool mit 5 x 10m, 2014/2015 renoviert. Die Finca liegt auf einem Grundstück mit einer Fläche von fast 10.000 m².  Die Unterkunft hat drei Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbetten. Die optimale Belegung für den gemütlichen Urlaub ist mit vier bis sechs Gästen. Gegebenfalls kann im Master Bed Room ein Sofa noch zu einem Bett ausgeklappt werden. Für Kleinkinder steht zusätzlich noch ein Kinderbettchen zur Verfügung. Der Pool ist umgeben von einer blickdichten Pflanzenhecke, die das Gefühl des Ungestörtseins unterstützt. Wunderbar und erholsam ist die Terrasse im Obergeschoß, wo man mit Blick auf Santanyi und das Meer gerne den Tag beginnen oder ausklingen lässt. Die Gegend um Santanyi ist herrlich. Schon die Anfahrt zur Finca schafft Urlaubsstimmung: kleine Seitenstraßen gesäumt von alten Steinmauern, von Feldern, Schafweiden und Mandelbaumplantagen. Das nahe Santanyi, sowie das beschauliche Cala Llombards mit seinen traumhaften Buchten, bieten die Höh

Wunderbar und erholsam ist die Terrasse im Obergeschoß, wo man mit Blick auf Santanyi und das Meer gerne den Tag beginnen oder ausklingen lässt. Die Gegend um Santanyi ist herrlich. Schon die Anfahrt zur Finca schafft Urlaubsstimmung: kle
neighborhood_overview: Angrenzend an die Finca ist eine große Mandelbaumplantage mit über 300 Bäumen (~ 40.000 m²), ein kleines unbewohntes und ein sehr großes Privatgrundstück (~160.000 m²). Für Ruhe sollte also gesorgt sein.
notes: In der Finca habe wir eine kleine Info-Mappe mit Tipps zum Gebäude und der Ausstattung hinterlegt. Darin sind ebenfalls Ausflugsziele, Restaurant-Empfehlungen etc. zu finden.
transit: Ein Mietwagen ist geboten.
access: Unsere Gäste nutzen den gesamten Wohn- und Aufenthaltsbereich der Finca, sowie das großzügige Grundstück.
interaction: Vor Ort gibt es Ansprechpartner. Details bei Buchung.
house_rules: Parties und Feiern sind nicht gestattet.
host_about:
Seit vielen Jahren sammeln wir Erfahrungen als Gäste in Ferienhäusern. Dabei ist uns stets wichtig, den eigenen Rhythmus leben zu können, unabhängig zu sein, Ruhe zu finden. Zum Wohlfühlen im Feriendomizil gehört für uns neben der Ruhe auch Sauberkeit und eine gute Betreuung vor Ort bei Fragen und Problemen. Das ist unser Leitbild. 

In 2014 haben wir die Finca SILA als Urlaubsdomizil für unsere Familie erstanden. In der von uns nicht genutzten Zeit sollen Gäste in den Genuss dieses Kleinods kommen. Schön, diesen Standard nun unseren eigenen Gästen anbieten zu können.

Viele Grüße, die Fischers.

name: Hermosa casa de pueblo con jardín
summary: Casa muy luminosa de dos pisos con mucho encanto, dónde podréis disfrutar de unos días de tranquilidad en un espacio armonioso y cálido.
space: Casa muy luminosa de dos pisos con mucho carácter.  En la planta de abajo, hay una entrada espaciosa, una zona de lectura, un despacho, una cocina rústica y un baño. Además desde ahí se accede al patio y al jardín hermoso , donde se puede desayunar y comer a la sombra en un agradable entorno. En la planta de arriba está la sala de estar con un sofá, una habitación de matrimonio y otra habitación con una cama individual con acceso a una pequeña terraza.
description: Casa muy luminosa de dos pisos con mucho encanto, dónde podréis disfrutar de unos días de tranquilidad en un espacio armonioso y cálido. Casa muy luminosa de dos pisos con mucho carácter.  En la planta de abajo, hay una entrada espaciosa, una zona de lectura, un despacho, una cocina rústica y un baño. Además desde ahí se accede al patio y al jardín hermoso , donde se puede desayunar y comer a la sombra en un agradable entorno. En la planta de arriba está la sala de estar con un sofá, una habitación de matrimonio y otra habitación con una cama individual con acceso a una pequeña terraza. La cocina cuenta con varios electrodomésticos: cocina de gas, frigorífico, horno,  tostadora, exprimidor , cafeteras, batidora. La casa dispone de WIFI y televisor. La ropa de cama, toallas, papel higiénicos y jabón están a disposición. En caso de duda o de necesidad, pueden contactarme en mi taller a 20 metros de casa por teléfono, e-mail y también por (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). La casa está ubicada
neighborhood_overview: La casa está ubicada en el centro del pueblo de Santanyí, a 200 metros  de la iglesia y de la plaza mayor, dónde hay supermercados, bares, restaurantes y semanalmente un mercado muy atractivo. El pueblo es muy hermoso con sus casas de piedra , y sus calles bien cuidadas, es ideal para disfrutar de unas vacaciones tranquila alejados de las zonas mas turísticas de la isla.  Cala Santanyi, cala del Moro, cala S'Almunia, cala Llombards , Es Trenc....,algunas de las playas mas espectaculares de la isla se encuentran a pocos kilometros.
notes: Normalmente yo me cuido del jardin. Esto quiere dicir que tengo que entrar en la casa tambièn si estan mis huespedes. Lo hago cada dos o tres dias , depende del calor, y cuando no estan para no molestar. He tomado esta decision para que todos mis huespedes, desde el primero hasta el ultimo,  puedan disfrutar de un jardin hermoso . Gracias
transit: Es necesario alquilar un coche para desplazarse con comodidad , porque como en toda la isla el servicio de transporte publico es escaso. La bicicleta es un alternativa porque  hay muchas rutas por caminos secundarios donde disfrutar del paisaje y de los campos .
access: La cocina cuenta con varios electrodomésticos: cocina de gas, frigorífico, horno,  tostadora, exprimidor , cafeteras, batidora. La casa dispone de WIFI y televisor. La ropa de cama, toallas, papel higiénicos y jabón están a disposición.

house_rules: No se admiten mascotas. se ruega no fumar dentro de casa.

name: Chalet Nady in Cala d'Or - personally & domestic
summary: Wunderschönes, kleines ( 90 m² ) und einzigartiges Chalet im "alten" Cala d'Or. Das Haus und die Umgebung erinnert stark an Ibiza, da Cala d'Or als Projekt auf dem Reissbrett geplant wurde und die Anforderung damals war, sich stark an die ibizianische Architektur anzulehnen.... So hat erinnert der Aufenthalt tatsächlich stark an Ibiza mit seinen weißen Häusern... Unmittelbare Nähe zum Hafen, Strand und dem Zemtrum von Cala d'Or. Man fühlt sich wie ein Einheimischer und nicht wie ein Tourist.
space: 2 Schlafzimmer, 1 Badezimmer, Wohn- und Essbereich mit Meerblick, Sonnenterrasse Entspannung pur und doch nah am Geschehen!  Das Chalet Nady liegt im alten malerischen Viertel von Cala D’Or, im sonnigen Südosten Mallorcas. Das Haus besticht durch seine ruhige aber dennoch zentrale Lage und die unmittelbare Nähe zum Meer.  Die Strandbucht Cala D'Or ist nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt. Das Haus bietet Platz für 4 Personen und ist daher für einen Familien-, Strand- und Wanderurlaub sehr geeignet. Es verfügt über 2 Schlafzimmer, ein Badezimmer mit großzügiger Dusche, einen Wohn- und Essbereich mit Kamin/Ofen sowie TV mit deutschen Kanälen und einer voll ausgestatteten modernen Küche mit Geschirrspüler und Mikrowelle sowie einen kleinen Garten.  Auf der sonnigen Terrasse hat man einen schönen Blick auf das Mittelmeer und den Yachthafen von Cala D’Or. Dieser ist fußläufig erreichbar. Das Haus ist klimatisiert und verfügt auch über Heizungen.  WLAN ist kostenlos verfügbar. Das Zentrum von Cala

name: CASA M, oasis in Majorca south (B)
summary: An isolated property lost in typical mediterranean landscape. We offer an independant suite: the Blue Room with bath-room en suite opening to a tropical Patio. Swimming-pool, solárium, outdoor dining-room, independant kitchen for guests, BBQ..
space: We do hope that you'll like Casa M at first sight. Its situation is unique. Two hectares and half of typical mediterranean  landscape isolated inside of its stone-dried walls. Trees, a lot of trees: almond, fig, and palm-trees, tamaris, eucalyptus, "algarrobas". Birds, a lot of birds, the usual wake-up call here. Space, a lot of space where everybody can feel independant .
description: An isolated property lost in typical mediterranean landscape. We offer an independant suite: the Blue Room with bath-room en suite opening to a tropical Patio. Swimming-pool, solárium, outdoor dining-room, independant kitchen for guests, BBQ..    We do hope that you'll like Casa M at first sight. Its situation is unique. Two hectares and half of typical mediterranean  landscape isolated inside of its stone-dried walls. Trees, a lot of trees: almond, fig, and palm-trees, tamaris, eucalyptus, "algarrobas". Birds, a lot of birds, the usual wake-up call here. Space, a lot of space where everybody can feel independant . The Patio, of course, heart of Casa M. Outside sitting-rooms and dining-rooms. BBQ. Almond-trees fields . "Wild" space with rabbits going down the hill... Swimming-pool solarium, lawns A separate kitchen where the guests  can cook their meals, except of course  breakfast included in the price. All the time . whenever it is required. From the moment we welcome our guests
neighborhood_overview: Every village around, Ses Salines, Campos, Cas Concos and specially Santanyi well known as one of the most picturesque in Majorca, have their market day (once or twice a week) usually displayed around the church. Freshly gathered fruits and vegetables, fish, local specialities, latest island fashion and special hats , plus a lot of handicrafts...A must go during your stay.  Cafes and restaurants all around with incredible local atmosphere. Santanyi / 4km from Casa M with its 2 " satellites, Cala Santanyi and Cala Figuera is naturally first on your list when it comes to go out for dinner. But do not forget that every fisherman village on the coast, Porto Petro , Porto Colom, Colonia San Jordi or Ses Salines offer a wide range of restaurants- fish, majorcan dishes or paellas- at affordable prices.  From Casa M , you can visit daily and easily  the best beaches of all the Balaric islands. Endless Es Trenc and Sa Rapita. S'Amarador in the Natural Park of Mondrago. And a great number of "ca
notes: We have a special host, Lynch the poney. The kids love him: he is always ready to eat carrots or apple and  sometimes to go for a ride.
transit: You really need a car to enjoy the most of your holidays here. Nevertheless, there are buses from Santanyi to the beaches and from Campos to Palma Rent a bike in Campos
access: The Patio, of course, heart of Casa M. Outside sitting-rooms and dining-rooms. BBQ. Almond-trees fields . "Wild" space with rabbits going down the hill... Swimming-pool solarium, lawns A separate kitchen where the guests  can cook their meals, except of course  breakfast included in the price.
interaction: All the time . whenever it is required. From the moment we welcome our guests to their departure, at Casa M we all do our best to make your majorcan holidays quite unforgettable.
house_rules: Liberty, as long as it is lived with respect to the others
host_about:
Hola, me llamo Marie. Despues de haber viajado mucho he venido a vivir aquí en Mallorca, el único sitio del mundo donde quiero quedarme ahora. Me encanta la isla, especialmente el entorno de mi casa, aislada y rodeada de almendros, algarrobos y higueras. Flores, muchas flores. Párajos, muchos párajos. Y vistas, maravillosas vistas al campo mallorquin. El sol es mi compañero. Aqui nunca hace realmente frio y, los dias de lluvia- si, hay algunos- hay que piensar que es bueno para la tierra. El mar, mi otra pasión, se encuentra muy cerca como es normal en una isla. La costa sur de la isla, muy distincta de la norte, es de lo mas pitoresca  con sus numerosas calas, una mas bonita que la otra. Me gustan también los pueblos, cada uno alrededor de su  iglesia, cada uno con su dia de mercado. 
La vida ha hecho que ahora he abierto mi casa : la gente viene a mi para sus vacaciones, relajada. Y  recibo a mis huespedes en CASA M como amigos. Amigos de todo el mundo, porque hablo varias idiomas, a quienes intento cada vez comunicar mi amor  y lo que conozco de esta isla.

name: Finca CATALINA  / wonderful house with pool
summary: This stunning house is just a 5 minute drive from the beach. It has a swimming pool, BBQ and huge patio.  It features 4 bedrooms and 2 complete bathrooms accommodating up to 7 people. Mínimum stay : 7 days
space: This beautiful beach house offers an ample outdoor space completed with a private swimming pool and BBQ area.  It has 1 double bedroom, 2 twin bedroom, 1 single bedroom, 2 complete bathrooms, living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen.  Surrounded by Mallorcan autochthonous plants and tres, the property offers to visitors a fresh and natural environment. The 1st bedroom has 135x190cm double bed, 2 bedside tables, a lamp, chair, wardrobe and window overlooking the exterior. A baby cot and feeding chair can be arranged free of charge.  The 2nd and the 3rd bedroom have 2 individual beds , 2 bedside tables and a lamp, chair, wardrobe and window overlooking the exterior.  The 4th bedroom has 1 single bed, a bedside table and lamp, a chair and window overlooking the exterior.  The living room,  is bright a- with french doors leading off onto the terrace space.  It has an L-shaped sofa, coffee table, a beautiful fireplace,  and 2 floor to ceiling windows giving access to the garden a
description: This stunning house is just a 5 minute drive from the beach. It has a swimming pool, BBQ and huge patio.  It features 4 bedrooms and 2 complete bathrooms accommodating up to 7 people. Mínimum stay : 7 days
neighborhood_overview: Within close proximity the Parc Natural de Cala Mondrago should be up there on your to do list. It is a beautiful natural reserve with gorgeous walking trails and some of the most stunning beaches with waters unparallelled in clarity.  Porto Petro is a pretty little fishing village which has its own secluded beach and gorgeous harbour. Walking along the harbour you will find as stretch of restaurants and bars dotted around offering an array of different cuisine, try opting for local mediterranean eateries as they will have a delicious menu of freshly caught fish!  The tourist resort of Cala D'or has a bustling night life, a wide variety of restaurants, shops and its lovely marina is less than 10 minutes drive.
transit: From Palma airport Santanyi is about a 40 to 50 minute drive if you should hire a car (this you can do at the airport or arrange prior to arrival from many car hire companies based on the island).  You also have the option to take a taxi or bus. Buses from the airport run regularly and you should catch the number 1 bus to Plaza España in Palma, from here there is a bus and train terminal which offer routes all over the island.Taxis can be caught from the airport exit terminal and run on a metre, depending on your distance, prices vary.
interaction: The owner of this house is Catalina.  She rents her houses since the 90's and know what hosting is about.  She lives close by and is 24/7 available. Uno+Tres also offers a 24/7 attention (telephone or internet) if you need help or information. The keys will be in a safe box (to be opened with a code) and you will meet the owner, if necessary, the day after your arrival.
house_rules: Please be careful with the use of the water and the air conditioner as we follow Mallorca's ecological recomendations. Thank you. IMPORTANT: Please note that in June, July, August and September the house will be rented from Saturday to Saturday. Thank you.
host_about:
Hello from Mallorca !

UNO+TRES opens the door to Mallorca's most interesting places to stay.

We are an enthusiastic company based in Palma de Mallorca working with the best fincas, villas and apartments in the nicest areas of the island.

For us, you are our guests, and our first goal is your satisfaction. 

We work hard to give you the best service and to be a good "connection" between you and the owners.

We are a team - answering, listening, resolving problems, giving advices, .. always doing our best for you.

Book your holidays with us, you won't be disappointed and please don't hesitate to contact us !

name: Apartment 'Charo' next to the beach
summary: Beautiful duplex (ground and 1st floor) sea frontline. 5 min walk to beach. Large private terrace and stunning views. Quiet and family orientated complex, shared pool, car parking secure area, solariums and ladders by the rocks for sea swimming.
