neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right between two sand beaches: Cala Ferrera and Cala Esmeralda. Only a 5 min walk each. Cala Ferrera and Cala d' Or are two wonderful resorts with entertainment for the whole family. It is an appropriate place for both a relaxing or a more active holiday . The apartment is at the end of a quiet street but, at the same time, it has all kinds of amenities within walking distance : supermarket, shops, restaurants, chemist, health center ... You can reach the center of Cala d' Or walking in 10-15 minutes. This is a walk through pleasant streets full of shops, restaurants, children amenities, etc. Next to Cala d'Or you will find Cala d'Or Marina, a wonderful place for views, to walk around and try any of their wonderful restaurants. Just 15 minutes by car you will find a great 18-hole golf course : Vall d'Or Golf .
transit: Palma Airport is 50 minutes away by car. At the airport there are taxis, buses and several car rental agencies. The port of Palma 60 min drive. Buses travel to anywhere on the island.
access: The complex is very quiet and familiar. No traffic to worry about. It is surrounded by well maintained gardens . Shared pool and next to it a nice area on the rocks for sunbathing and ladders to swim in the sea. Reception Office and parking area with security barrier.
interaction: There will be a local contact available 24 hours. I will be available via telephone. The Reception Office is open from Easter until the end of October.
house_rules: The apartment is non-smoking but you are welcome to smoke outside in the terrace. Sorry we do not accept pets. Linen and towels are provided however beach towels are not supplied.
host_about:
Disfruto haciendo que mis clientes se sientan como en casa y que saquen partido de mis propiedades como si fueran suyas.
Me encanta viajar y encontrar un alojamiento agradable tanto como acoger a huéspedes y proporcionarles una buena estacia. La movilidad de personas entre regiones y paises es muy enriquecedora.

name: Modernes Apartment mit Patio

name: Casa "Can Pau" in Cala Figuera
summary: Eine Ruheoase! Idyllisch gelegene Finca oberhalb von Cala Figuera. Das  Gelände hat einen phantastischen Meerblick. Das individuelle Familienhaus hat einen Pool, einen In- und Outdoor-Kamin und ein Studio, welches hinzu gemietet werden kann.
space: Willkommen in unser mallorquinischen Finca "CAN PAU" in Cala Figuera! Unser helles, alleinstehendes Haus ist eine Oase der Ruhe und befindet sich oberhalb des Hafens von Cala Figuera wenige Autominuten von den Stränden Cala Santani und S´Amarador entfernt. Das Familienhaus ist individuell ausgestattet und bietet Platz für fünf Personen. Es hat drei Schlafzimmer und zwei Bäder und ist ideal für eine Familie mit zwei Kindern oder zwei Paaren. Sollten Oma und Opa Ihre Familie begleiten, können Sie das STUDIO dazu mieten.  Unser Haus ist ruhig gelegen, hier können Sie die Seele baumeln lassen. Sie können in der Hängematte liegen oder auf den Holzliegen am Pool die Sonne anbeten. Wer Ruhe möchte, kann sich auf einer der zwei weiteren Terrassen zurückziehen und die Sonne bis in den Abend hinein genießen. So können Sie auf das Wasser schauen, die Gedanken schweifen lassen oder in Ihrem Lieblingsbuch schmökern.   Sollte es am Abend einmal kühl sein, ist das Haus mit einem Kamin im offenen Wohn

neighborhood_overview: Das Gelände unserer Ruheoase liegt oberhalb von Cala Figuera und ein kleiner Weg führt direkt zum hübschen Hafen, der in wenigen Fußminuten erreicht wird. Die schönen Strände von Cala Santanyi und S'amarador sind nur wenige Autominuten entfernt. Dies gilt auch für Santanyí mit ihrer hübschen Altstadt und dem sehr schönen mallorquinischen Wochenmarkt rund um die Plaça Major.
house_rules: Unser CAN PAU ist ein Nichtraucherhaus. Haustiere sind willkommen. Bei starken Wind müssen die Sonnenschirme geschlossen werden. Und damit dauerhaft die Qualität der Poolgarnitur für die Gäste erhalten bleibt, werden die Auflagen über Nacht trocken gelagert. Im Haus liegt eine Hausordnung aus.
host_about:
Liebe Gäste,

als Fotografin im Bereich Fashion und Lifestyle habe ich ein Gefühl für Farben, Formen und Styling. Dies setze ich leidenschaftlich in der Einrichtung und Ausstattung meines Ferienhauses in Timmendorfer Strand um.

Ich möchte, dass Sie sich wohlfühlen und freue mich auf Ihre Anfrage!

Herzlichst Ihre Christine Rosinski

name: Sa Tanqueta 2
summary: Located in Calonge, Santanyí, this lovely terraced house offers a second home for 6 guests
space: After a long day on the beach you may fancy a dip in the 10mx 6m chlorine pool, which is shared with the neighbors. The chlorine pool has a depth between 0.9m and 1.8m. The communal plot is fenced and there are direct neighbors.  This chic accommodation counts with a terrace on the second floor overlooking the Bay of Cala D'Or. Enjoy a convivial evening having a barbecue with friends or a romantic dinner for two.  If you like cooking, you'll find everything you may need in the kitchen, including a vitro hob. The huge sitting-dining area is just perfect to spend an afternoon with your family, maybe while watching a film on the satellite-TV. There's a washing machine, iron and ironing board in the bathroom. There's one toilet on the ground floor.  The bedrooms are on the first floor, one with double bed, another with two twin beds and a third room with a bunk bed. Both bedrooms and living area are fitted with A/C. If you come with your baby, we supply one cot and one high chair. The bath

neighborhood_overview: Calonge is a genuine town of Mallorca and is ideal for people seeking tranquility. A 5 minutes' drive takes you to the beach of Cala D'Or and driving a few kilometers more you reach the beach of Cala Marçal and Mondrago as well as the fishermen's villages of Portopetro, Cala Figuera and Portocolom. Both in Calonge and S'Horta you'll find a small grocery shop and restaurants. More amenities and big supermarkets can be found in Cala D'Or. If you're into golf you can practice the perfect tee-off in Vall D'Or, just a 10 minutes drive from the house.
notes: Check-in: 4 pm Check-out: 10 am Very late arrival (from midnight) has an extra cost of 50 € Pets are not allowed.  The holding of events is forbidden.  Consult the advertiser for possible charges.
transit: Distances:  Beach:4.5 km - Cala Gran, Cala d'Or Airport:  53.9 km - Son Sant Joan Golf course: 5.2 km - Vall d'Or Golf, s'Horta Town:  0.01 km - Calonge Train station:  25 km - Manacor Bus stop: 0.45 km - Plaça de Sant Miquel, Calonge Ferry: 59 km - Port d'Alcúdia Hospital:26 km - Manacor
access: The accommodation is only for your own use. We’ll leave bed linen and bath towels for you (beach towels are not available).
interaction: If you have questions during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time through email or phone.
host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Waterfront villa with bay view
summary: Tucked beneath the pines is the Villa with a deep terrace for cool living.  Steps lead down to a private space for sunning and swimming,sand beach within 100 mtrs.  Located on a half island (residential)split by one road servicing only homes. QUIET!
space: The villa is located on a very quiet dead end street that leads to the lighthouse and residential luxury villas,at the bottom of its lot (50 meters from the road).  the 240 m2 fully walled in and gated mediterranean style villa is surrounded by a exotic garden of about 15 ares that stops 10 meters from the sea. The spacious living room and kitchen opens onto a very large terrasse facing the sea, there is many lounge furniture and a large dinning table for outdoor eating. the view from the main terrasse is breathtaking and it will take you 10 secondes to walk down to the sea (closed bay) ,with a private shore and sunbath area.if you prefer the beach, there's one 50 meters away. steps lead to the roof/terrasse (entire surface of the villa). Two of the bedrooms have private patios. *master bedroom: right wing Large room with 2 windows and one double glass door that gives on its private terrasse,king size bed,dresser with mirror,dressing with closets,private bathroom. *bedroom 1 : left win

neighborhood_overview: The "trendy" and authentique village and marina of Porto Petro are accessible by walk (15mnts)or by the road (5 mnts)or by boat (2 mnts).   There are two mini-markets with delivery service, outdoor farmers market , many restaurants on the marina,café,gelateria,shops, a Catholic church and a scuba diving center,Boat excursions. the action is at the touristic city and marina of Cala d'or (10 mnts drive). Golf course within 6km,tennis courts and full spa service can be done at the 5* "Blau" Hotel (2 mnts walk). Beautiful natural parc and beach of Cala Mondrago is 3 mnts away.
notes: - Dishwasher - washing machine - Micro-wave -fridge - Oven -hot and cold water - Cleaning lady on request (15 euros/h)
transit: If arriving by plane, taxi service recommended (45 mnts). Bus service from the airport to Porto Petro is also available. There is bus service available  to nearby towns  and to local beach areas. I recomand that you rent a car directly from the airport.
access: Sheets and towels provided, as well as cleaning products (not including dishwasher or clotheswasher soaps).  A cleaning lady can be provided on request (15 euros/hour).
interaction: I will welcome you personaly and show you how things work. there is a "do it all" man that you can call if you have any problems.
house_rules: Respect my villa and neighbors and it will be your best holiday ever ;)

name: Finca /Studio Urlaub Mallorca
summary: Verbringen Sie herrliche Ferien auf einer schönen alten Finca ..... zwischen Santanyi und Cala d`Or .
space: Auf 4,500m² Land gibt es viele Kakteen alt eingewachsene Bäume und Palmen . Das Studio verfügt über ein Wohn-Esszimmer mit Schlafsofa und einer kleinen Küchenzeile , einem Schlafzimmer und einem Duschbad. Hier können 2 Personen ( + 1Pers). einen erholsamen Urlaub verbringen. Mitten im Grünen und umgeben von der Natur  (Schafen ,Katzen ,Hunden )  Sonnenauf- und untergänge über den Feldern, kann man hier in vollen Zügen genießen. Auch geniesst man den Frühling Herbst und Winter bei uns ... Für das gewisse( knisternte Ambiente) sorgt der Kamin. Lage: Die nächstgelegenen Strände Cala d` Or ,Cala Egos ,Cala Sa Nau etc...) sind in weniger als 10 Minuten mit dem Auto erreichbar . Der idyllische Ort Santanyi mit Wochenmarkt vielen,, Bars, Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten ist ca. 10km entfernt. Calonge selbst verfügt über 4 Restaurants (URL HIDDEN) Freizeit....: Golf, Kanu/Kajak, Fahrradfahren, Tennis, Wandern, Segeln, Reiten, Schwimmen, Tauchen,etc..... Für weitere Infos stehen wir Ihnen

name: Charmantes Appartement im Herzen von Santanyi
summary: Charmantes Atelier Appartement im Herzen von Santanyi-Mallorca   Das Apt. befindet sich innerhalb eines alten renovierten Dorfhauses. Es besteht aus einem großen und hohem Raum. In ihm befinden sich ein abgeteiltes Bad, ein 1,60m großes Doppelbett, eine kleine, voll ausgestattete Küche, ein kleiner begehbarer Kleiderschrank, ein bequemes Schlafsofa und ein Eßtisch mit Stühlen. Die großzügige Terrasse mit Blick auf die Kirche lädt zum Verweilen und Träumen ein.
space: Das Apt. ist Teil des privaten Wohnhauses. Es liegt separat in der ersten Etage und hat einen eigenen Treppenaufgang. Die Terrasse steht zur alleinigen Verfügung. Parkplätze gibt es in unserer Straße oder auch in den Straßen drumherum. In unmittelbarer Nähe befindet sich die Plaza Canals mit weiteren Parkmöglichkeiten.

name: Can Domingo
summary: The Finca Can Domingo is located only 100 m. from the beach of Cala Santanyí. The house has 5 double bedroom and has a capacity for up to 10 people.
space: The Finca Can Domingo is located only 100 m. from the beach of Cala Santanyí. The house has 5 double bedroom and has a capacity for up to 10 people. The 200 m2 of the house are distributed over one floor, where you will find a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 5 double bedrooms, three bathrooms, one of them "on suite" and a laundry room. Outside the house you will find generous terraces, a beautiful private pool (9 x 4 m), a barbecue area and outdoor furniture like tables, chairs and sun loungers.  SITUATION Just a few minutes walk from the house is the idyllic beach of Cala Santanyi. A beach with fine white sand, which has preserved the peace and the atmosphere of yesteryear.About 5 km. is the characteristic village of Santanyi with its restaurants and shops, its beautiful and romantic center, where twice a week, a very popular market takes place. June, July, august and September: Saturday to Saturday bookings will only be accepted.

name: Ferrera Park 3 bedrooms
summary: The apartments are located in the residencial complex Ferrera Park located five minutes walk to the lovely sandy beach Cala Ferrera. Cala Ferrera centre is 300m. away.
space: There are 5 apartments available. Each apartment has a bright lounge-dining area with sea views from the balcony. The living room is equipped with Satellite TV and DVD. The open kitchen counts with vitroceramic hob, fridge, microwave and washing machine. The balcony overlooking the sea is one of the highlights of these apartments. Each apartment has 3 bedrooms -with double or twin beds-  and two bath/shower rooms.  Staircase not appropriate for people with limited mobility. Should you need further information, please contact us. There is a community pool overlooking  the sea and direct access to the sea with ladder on the rocks.  Well kept garden with lawned areas has many pine trees that give a fresh atmosphere to the Ferrera Park.

name: Ca Tots
summary: Comfortable house over 3 floors with private pool, in Cala Figuera, for 8 people. The proximity to Santanyí Bay and Mondragó Nature Park ensures an unforgettable holiday.
space: Start the day with a bath in th(URL HIDDEN)poured chlorine water pool with a water depth of 0,80 - 1,80 m. 8 sun loungers around the pool will tempt you to relax and in between you will find a garden shower for refreshment. With the built-in barbecue, you can change the menu. Terraces and the furnished veranda invite you to spend the whole day outdoors. From the terrace you enter the lower floor of the house (-1) with living - dining area, bathroom with bath tub and the laundry with washing machine, ironing board and iron. neighborhood_overview: The surroundings of Cala Figuera and the Natural Park Mondragó are ideal for long walks or cycling tours. In the small port of Cala Figuera there are still some fishermen going out with the typical Llaüt boat and offer the fresh fish for sale in the evening. The coves and beaches in this part of Mallorca, such as Cala Figuera, Cala Santanyí or Es Trenc, are particularly beautiful.
notes: Pets are not allowed.  The holding of events is forbidden.  On request electro heaters can be provided. Check-in: 4 pm Check-out: 10 am Very late check-in (from 24 pm) has an extra cost of 50 €
transit: Distances: Beach: 3 km - Playa de S'Amarador, Santanyí Airport: 49.9 km - Son Sant Joan, Palma Golf: 18.3 km - Vall d'Or Golf, S'Horta Town: 4.5 km - Santanyí Train station: 35.6 km - Plaza de la Estación, Manacor Bus stop: 3.4 km - Cala Figuera Ferry: 60.3 km - Puerto de Palma Hospital: 37.3 km - Hospital de Manacor
access: The house and its facilities are totally private. We’ll leave bed linen and bath towels for you (beach towels are not available).
interaction: If you have questions during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time through email or phone.
host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Sea View Villa Appartment
summary: The property is in second line cala view, completely furnished and equipped, sharing a private pool. The upper house, has 200sqm living space, more than 100sqm of terraces and an upper roof terrace of 200sqm, overseeing the Med Sea and the Cala D'Or.
space: With 4 bedrooms, en-suite 3 bathrooms, all completely renovated in 2007. The villa is beautifully furnished with a new fully equipped kitchen. A barbecue is present on one of its front terraces (embedded in the wall) and the villa has both a chimenea and central heating. It can be used all year round as the pool and its 800sq.m of garden are maintained during the year.

house_rules: We expect our guests to respect our property and leave it in the same condition as you find it.  You will be expected to lock up every time you leave the property including closing the security grill across the patio doors.  No music after 11.30pm as we do not want to disturb other residents.  No BBQs are allowed as we are in an area with pine trees and they may catch fire.  Cupboards with locks are for owners personal use only and do not contain any valuables unless you think toiletries and food are a valuable commodity ;.  You may not invite guests from other hotels or apartments into the complex to use the pool or gardens as they are for residents only.  Only use the swimming pool at the times specified by the pool - not life guard is present so keep an eye on small children.

name: Apartment 'Shalmar' next to beach
summary: Beautiful ground floor apartment, sea frontline. 5 min walk to beach. Large private terrace/patio and stunning views. Quiet and family orientated complex, shared pool, car parking secure area, solariums and ladders by the rocks for sea swimming.
space: Beautiful ground floor apartment with private garden and sea views. Set in picturesque surroundings with direct access to several beaches and communal swimming pool. Quiet gated residential property within close proximity of excellent bars, restaurants and entertainment. A safe location for all age groups. This is an idyllic location which provides everything you could possibly want from a beach holiday.The apartment is large, spacious and airy with newly fitted kitchen and refurbished throughout to ensure a comfortable stay. The main bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There is a separate shower room with extra WC. The living area has a sofa bed with ample seating areas. Double doors open out onto the patio which provides shade from the sun for very hot days and a lovely spot to dine around the table or lounge on the patio furniture and pass the time relaxing. Cala Ferrera is a superb holiday resort approximately 45 minutes from Palma airport. There is so much to do with nearby nature pa
description: Beautiful ground floor apartment, sea frontline. 5 min walk to beach. Large private terrace/patio and stunning views. Quiet and family orientated complex, shared pool, car parking secure area, solariums and ladders by the rocks for sea swimming. Beautiful ground floor apartment with private garden and sea views. The main bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There is a separate shower room with extra WC. The living area has a sofa bed with ample seating areas. Double doors open out onto the patio which provides shade from the sun for v
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right between two sand beaches: Cala Ferrera and Cala Esmeralda. Only a 5 min walk each. Cala Ferrera and Cala d' Or are two wonderful resorts with entertainment for the whole family. It is an appropriate place for both a relaxing or a more active holiday . The apartment is at the end of a quiet street but, at the same time, it has all kinds of amenities within walking distance : supermarket, shops, restaurants, chemist, health center ... You can reach the center of Cala d' Or walking in 10-15 minutes. This is a walk through pleasant streets full of shops, restaurants, children amenities, etc. Next to Cala d'Or you will find Cala d'Or Marina, a wonderful place for views, to walk around and try any of their wonderful restaurants. Just 15 minutes by car you will find a great 18-hole golf course : Vall d'Or Golf .
transit: Palma Airport is 50 minutes away by car. At the airport there are taxis, buses and several car rental agencies. The port of Palma 60 min drive. Buses travel to anywhere on the island.
access: The complex is very quiet and familiar. No traffic to worry about. It is surrounded by well maintained gardens . Shared pool and next to it a nice area on the rocks for sunbathing and ladders to swim in the sea. Reception Office and parking area with security barrier.
interaction: There will be a local contact available 24 hours. I will be available via telephone. The Reception Office is open from Easter until the end of October.
house_rules: The apartment is non-smoking but you are welcome to smoke outside in the terrace/patio. Sorry we do not accept pets.
host_about:
Disfruto haciendo que mis clientes se sientan como en casa y que saquen partido de mis propiedades como si fueran suyas.
Me encanta viajar y encontrar un alojamiento agradable tanto como acoger a huéspedes y proporcionarles una buena estacia. La movilidad de personas entre regiones y paises es muy enriquecedora.

name: Can Marines - Spacious house; 5 km from Cala d'Or
summary: Bright and quiet 250m2 villa located in Calonge, Santanyí. This property offers wonderful views of the countryside and has capacity for 8 people.
space: This cottage has a very large landscaped exterior. It features a chlorine 9x4,5m pool, with a depth ranging from 1.30m to 1.85m. Around the pool there is a 70m2 paved area in which you can relax in one of 10 sun loungers available and where there is also 1 umbrella. In this paved area you will also find 1 outdoor shower where you can rinse off when coming from the beach or after a walk around the field. At the same time, on the outside of villa there are fruit trees and a 90 m2 fenced in lawn area, which is perfect for younger children to enjoy. This house has a total of 3 furnished terraces (2 of them can be accessed from 2 of the bedrooms on the 1st floor): 2 are 12 m2 in size and  the 3rd one is 30m2. The house is surrounded by a 24m2 porch where you can enjoy wonderful evenings outdoors with family and friends. Near the porch there is also 1 fixed barbecue where you can enjoy cooking outdoors. Besides all this, this property has 1 gym  with 2 machines on the 1st floor, and an area

neighborhood_overview: Both the property and its surroundings give you a calmed feeling, so it is ideal to relax and enjoy the natural surroundings. The villa is located within an 11,000 m!ª plot of in an environment that invites you to take long walks through dry fields, and the almond and pine trees. The house is just 450m from the village of S'Horta where they can find everything you  might need during  your holiday. This is a town with great commercial life and interesting places to visit. Just 4.5km away you will find the beach of Cala d'Or, one of the most authentic areas of Mallorca. With the car and in only 15 min. You can also get to other beaches that are worth it,  such as Cala Mondragó, Cala Ferrera, Portopetro or Cala Sa Nau. In addition, this property is 60 km from the city of Palma where you can go sightseeing and make cultural visits, go shopping or enjoy the nightlife of the city.
notes: Check-in: 4 pm Check-out: 10 am Very late check-in (from 24 pm) has an extra cost of 50 €
transit: Distances Beach: 4.7 km - Cala d'Or Airport: 53.4 km - Palma Golf course: 4.2 km - Golf Vall d'Or Town: 0.450 km - Horta Train station: 25.6 km - Manacor Bus stop: 0.750 km - Calle Jaume Prohens Ferry: 63.1 km - Port of Palma Hospital: 27.5 km - Manacor
access: The house is only for your own use.  We’ll leave bed linen and bath towels for you (beach towels are not available)
interaction: If you have questions during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time through email or phone.
host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Chalet independiente, muy tranquilo
summary: Ideal acceso a playas, naturaleza en zona, senderismo, bicicleta. Cala Figuera –Santanyi- cerca del Parque Natural de Mondragó (al sur-este de Mallorca). Payas próximas: Naturales S´Amarador, Cap des Moro, Cala Almunia, Es trenc. Otras, Cala Santanyí
space: Comodidad, tranquilidad, desconexión, un espacio familiar, sin ruidos,  Pueden alojarse de 8 a 10 personas adultas. 3 habitaciones dobles en  planta superior (una cama doble y las otras dos con 2 camas individuales cada uno). Otro dormitorio en planta principal,  con cama doble. 3 baños completos, cocina, salón comedor en planta principal y amplio comedor en planta baja mismo nivel que barbacoa.  Terrazas, jardín y piscina (8x4mts)

No hay problemas de parking Ambiente familiar, en contacto con los huéspedes por cualquier necesidad que pueda surgir. La vivienda es independiente, sin apenas circulación de vehículos, pocos vecin
neighborhood_overview: La vivienda es independiente, sin apenas circulación de vehículos, pocos vecinos y distantes.
notes: Espacio suficiente para jugar los niños y sin ningún problema en jugar en toda la zona. Mercado típico en el pueblo Santanyi, con sus artesanías y productos del huerto –miércoles y sábados- En el centro del pueblo de Santanyi hay tiendas de calzado y ropa. Asi como supermercados tanto en Santanyi como  Cala Figuera. En la zona hay muchas calas y playas distintas a las playas de mayor aglomeración turística  Zonas cercanas turísticas y de ocio: Cala Dor, Porto Petro También ambiente nocturno muy tranquilo y acogedor con restaurantes en el centro del pueblo de Santanyi. Ideal para cenas al aire libre con niños Recomendable circuitos en bicicleta y senderismo Puertos deportivos cercanos  Restaurantes y boutiques
transit: Distancia al pueblo Santanyi  4,5 Kms.  Distancia al núcleo de población de   Cala Figuera 800 mts (Ruta sendero muy bonito a pie bordeando costa).  Para ir a Palma y a otras localidades hay servicio de Bus Público con salida desde Santanyí y Cala Figuera. Aconsejable alquilar coche, explorar la zona para descubrir parajes y calas maravillosas. Naturaleza total. Ningún problema en dejar el coche delante el chalet
access: Jardín, piscina, tumbonas, barbacoa, ducha en piscina, tv, lavadora, sábanas y toallas. Cocina totalmente equipada. No hay problemas de parking
interaction: Ambiente familiar, en contacto con los huéspedes por cualquier necesidad que pueda surgir.
house_rules: Se debe respetar el descanso nocturno en la zona. Es zona tranquila  por lo que en caso de fiesta exclusivamente familiar, debe ser como máximo hasta 23:30 Se aceptan mascotas.  Perros grandes
host_about: Jubilado, Ex directivo Compañía aérea. He vivido en varias ciudades de España y el extranjero. Lo que mas nos gusta es viajar, sin programa y con mi esposa. Viajar a mi aire

name: Na Clavet. Casa rural de lujo en entorno natural
summary: Preciosa casa rural, situada en medio del campo mallorquín, muy tranquila y totalmente aislada. Rodeada de paraje totalmente natural, en el que se encuentran multitud de árboles frutales, olivos, almendros, algarrobos... A 1 minuto de la carretera principal, situada en una zona estratégica: a 3 minutos del pueblo más cercano y a 5 minutos de las playas, del Parque Natural de Mondragó, del puerto tradicional pesquero de Porto Petro y del pintoresco pueblo de Cala d'Or. Casa de nueva construcció

name: Lovely Studio just steps from Cala Esmeralda
summary: The studio is located on the 1st floor, in quiet section of the building, with a garden across the way from the entrance. The apartment is beautifully decorated with a serene, modern decor.   The terrace overlooks the pool, and gets plenty of sun in the afternoon and early evening. The building is on a quiet road, a short walk away from all the shops and restaurants in town. Best of all you are just steps away from Cala Esmerelda Beach.
space: It is equipped with a queen size bed, sofa bed, bistro table, chairs and closets with plenty of storage space. It comes fully equipped with linens, towels, kitchen accessories, all brand new.  The terrace has a couch with wheels so you can move from sun to shade in style. There is wooden dining furniture for 3 guests as well. The location of Cinque Punte Residencia is just off a main road, at the end of a dead end street, the area around the building is free from traffic and crowds, and there is ample parking.  After only a short stroll down a path,  you will find yourself at the steps to Cala Esmerelda Beach. Within minutes, you can access Cala Gran, Cala Ferrera, and of course Cala D’Or, by foot, by the Minitrenet or Starfish glass bottom boat!  The stunning national park, Cala Mondrago is just 15 minutes by car.The villages of Santanyi, Felanitx are both 15 km away,  and Calonge only 4 km away.

name: Villa Sa Rota Nova, Santanyi
summary: Gorgeous hillside villa with spacious rooms opening up to a stunning sea view. A truly special place to relax and explore the beautiful island of Mallorca. Pick fruit from the organic garden, soak up the sun by the pool and take in the views of the rolling landscape from the cozy terrace. Just 10 mins drive from the beach and minutes from the charming S'Alqueria Blanca, this is the tranquil base for your Mallorcan getaway. We are happy to welcome you to this luxury home away from home!
space: The magical Sa Rota Nova is embedded in the rolling Mediterranean landscape and impresses with stunning views. The surrounding nature continues to amaze  all year round with a variety of fruit ripening monthly in the garden. You can enjoy the large heated swimming pool with salt cleaning system (no chlorine), an outdoor BBQ area, pentanque court and small chapel. The shady terrace provides a stunning outdoor dining space with spectacular views and a built in sound system perfect for entertaining.  The interior of the house has been carefully considered by the well renowned designer Inson Wood. The house is spacious, with all the bedrooms benefiting from modern en-suite bathrooms. One of the bedrooms enjoys the privacy of a separate entrance.  A stones throw away are the gorgeous Santanyi with it's weekly farmers market, Porto Petro and Cala d'Or.  The beaches of Cala Mondrago, Cala Santanyi and Cala Llombards are all 10 minutes by car. The amazing 18-hole golf course of Vall d'Or can b

interaction: Local property manager, Nico, will be available to help you make your stay comfortable and deal with any queries.
host_about: A citizen of the world, currently based in London. I am lucky to be following my passion in Architecture as a full time job. I love meeting new people and discovering new places and cultures.

name: Quiet house close to the sea
summary: Very comfortable accommodation for six people. Surrounded by pine trees, quiet and peaceful just 200m from the port and restaurants. Several beach coves near vicinity (600m / 2000m). Mondragó natural park, golf, diving, hiking, horse riding etc.
space: Detached house with excellent location to stay up to 6 people comfortably.  1 bedroom with double bed, 2 bedrooms with 2 single beds. 2 bathrooms. Living Room and very spacious and comfortable gallery. Kitchen. Lavandería.Terraza furnished. Private garden. Air conditioning and heating in all rooms. Wifi. Parking.

name: CASA CHIARA Haus m. Garten Mallorca
summary: Folgende Preise gelten f
space: Herzlich Willkommen auf der Sonneninsel Mallorca ! Unser wunderschönes Haus liegt sehr ruhig im kleinen Ort Cala Llombards, in nur 5 Auto Minuten, bzw. 15 Minuten zu Fuss vom nächsten Strand Cala Llombards oder S'Almonia entfernt. Zum Flughafen sind es nicht mal 50 km entfernt, die Fahrt dauert max. 45 Minuten. Die Wohnfläche beträgt 110m², ein Wohnzimmer mit offenem Kamin, 2 Schlafzimmer, 2 Duschbäder, Wintergarten und großer Sonnenterrasse mit super Blick auf Obstgärten.  Vom Flachdach, das voll begehbar ist sehen und hören sie das Meeresrauschen. Das freistehende Haus hat einen großen 450m² Garten mit Palmen, schattenspendenden Pinien vielen Blumen und Rasen. Optimal ist das Haus für 4 Personen; ein Elternschlafzimmer, ein Kinderzimmer mit zwei Betten und ein weiteres Zimmer mit Ausziehcouch für 1 Person Die Ausstattung besteht weiterhin aus Waschmaschine, Tresor, Sateliten TV, zweckmäßig eingerichtete Küche mit großem Kühlschrank mit Frostfach, Gasherd und Vorratskammer. Wir bewohn

name: PEDRASSA PETITA 1
summary: This nice apartment with communal pool and close to the sea is located in Cala Santanyí and offers accommodation for 6 people.
space: The well-kept, communal exteriors features a chlorine, 11m x 10m chlorine pool with a depth ranging from 1.7m to 1.8m, a children's pool with a depth of 0.7m, a barbecue zone, a laundry and an exterior shower. Furthermore, you'll have access to a heated indoor pool, a fitness centre and a sauna, located in a housing development next door (about 70 meters). The plot is fenced and it is a quiet and very Mediterranean place.  This apartment is on the ground floor and two porches are nice for having breakfast with your family. Inside, a sitting-dining room with satellite-TV is ideal for a little siesta. The kitchen is well-equipped, including a vitro hob. There are three bedrooms, two with two single beds each and one with double bed. All bedrooms have a shower bathroom en-suite. Additionally, there's a separate toilet. neighborhood_overview: The small urbanisation Cala Santanyí offers a grocery shop, cafés and restaurants and is surrounded by several dreamlike beaches as Playa de Cala Santanyí, Cala Figuera and the natural park of Mondragó. Southwards you'll find the precious rocky beach of Cala S'Almonia and the small sand bay Caló des Moro. The well-kept golf course of Vall d'Or is 18 km away. In the village of Santanyí there are more supermarkets and good restaurants serving typical food. On Wednesday and Saturday takes place the market in Santanyí, where you can buy fresh fruits and vegetables, clothes and souvenirs.

host_about:
Estimados viajeros, tengo una agéncia de casas en alquiler para vacaciones, estoy en el sur de Mallorca, disponemos de gran variedad de casas y a buen precio!
Me gusta la gente amable y educada, de buen rollo,  viajera,  familias con niños  y los amigos viajeros que buscan unos dias de relax en nuestra maravillosa isla, 
Estoy a vuestra disposición ante cualquier consulta.
Espero vuestra Reserva.
Un abrazo desde Mallorca,
¡Bienvenidos!

name: Villa mallorquina a un paso del mar y la playa
summary: Increíbles vistas al mar y a la cala, un lugar ideal para descansar y realizar actividades acuáticas, pero también un entorno para el descanso y el relax. A escasos 50 metros, la playa. Muy cerca de Porto Petro, un puerto con mucho encanto y vida. Te sentirás realmente bien en esta casa gracias a la luz, el espacio, las vistas, la tranquilidad... Mi alojamiento es ideal para grandes familias (con hijos) y grupos grandes.
space: Nuestra villa es la típica mallorquina, amplia y espaciosa, sin grandes lujos, pero acogedora, con todo lo necesario y sobre todo una ubicación excepcional con su bajada directa al mar. Es muy luminoso y al estar dividido en dos plantas, cada una de ellas con su cocina, su baño, etc. Puede ser más íntimo en el caso de que la compartan más de una familia.

neighborhood_overview: Una urbanización muy tranquila de villas y chalés en una zona con una ubicación excepcional y alejada de grandes núcleos urbanos. Rodeada de naturaleza y sitios para recorres y hacer actividades. Muy cerca hay un rancho para montar a caballo, también está muy cerca el parque natural de Cala Mondragó. Se puede incluso acceder al Spa del Hotel Blau Porto Petro, que está a cinco minutos (no incluido, se debe pagar en el spa)

host_about: Soy un mallorquín orgulloso de su tierra y costumbres. Mallorca es una isla para degustar, por medio de todos los sentidos, para vivirla con intensidad. Pongo a tu disposición mi casas para que experimentes el efecto de esta maravillosa isla.

name: CAS GENERAL
summary: This traditional house welcomes six guests and is located only 300 meters distance from one of the most amazing coves of the island, Cala d"en Borgit.
space: Welcome to this beautiful house with a large terrace full of flowers and plants, ideal for sittting down and enjoy a glass of wine, while you prepare a delicious barbecue to eat at the lovely stone table. You can also sunbathe at one of the hammocks and refresh at the external shower. The lovely porch, with access from the living room, invites you to sit down and relax, while contemplating the nature. This is a very quiet property, as is all fenced and is totally private. The house is divided all in one floor, where a comfortable and practical dining room is so perfect to sit and watch a film at the satellite TV (only spanish and german channels), or listening to some music. The mediterranean style fireplace is only for decoration purposes. The gas kitchen is full equipped with all the amenities you might need in your stay. neighborhood_overview: The house is located near Portopetro village, close to Mondragó Natural Park. You will love a visit to the wonderful Borgit cove, where you can only acceed walking. Mondragó is a protected area, known for its little crystalline beaches and coves, and all the lovely typical fauna and flora from this part of the island. We recommend to visit the little Colonia de Sant Jordi fishing village, where you can arrive by car and enjoy delicious fish and seafood dishes and have a walk through the gorgeous port, very nice at night as well. if you fancy a boat trip, we higly recommend a visit to Cabrera island. if you preffer the city, dont forget to visit the wonderful Cathedral and the large port full of every kind of boats.
notes: Si tiene preguntas durante su estancia no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros por teléfono o mail.

There are lots of restaurants, cafés, shops, pubs and discotheques if you like going out in the night. Southwards there is Mondragó, comprising a natural park and two sand beaches. The charming and small fishermens town Portopetro - known for good restaurants - is about 4 km away.

name: Es Jardi
summary: Set amidst lush tropical gardens in open countryside affording complete privacy and yet only 1km from the entrance to Cala d'Or. Ideal for those seeking private outdoor space.
space: Set amidst lush tropical gardens in open countryside affording complete privacy and yet only 1km from the entrance to Cala d'Or. Ideal for well known personalities requiring personal privacy. Location We are delighted to welcome this superb country property set amidst magnificent lush tropical gardens into our programme. Located off a quiet country lane in open countryside with far reaching panoramic views yet only 1km from the entrance to cosmopolitan Cala d'Or and so is within walking distance to an array of restaurants and boutique shops. Ideal for walkers, cyclists and nature lovers. Accommodation Impressively and superbly presented throughout with furnishings and fittings of the highest quality, combined with all rooms being very spacious and all bedrooms having air conditioning. name: Finca MIRO with big Pool and BBQ
summary: The property is completely fenced which is fantastic for families with children. Great swimming pool (3m. x 12m. Depth Min. 1m. Max. 1.60m.), ideal to refresh during the long summery days. By the pool there is a covered area with sun beds.
space: Miro is a spacious villa of 300sq, meters full of natural light, delightfully furnished with lovely details through.  The ground floor counts with an elegant living/dining room with a big corner sofa. From here there is access to a bright conservatory with views to a Mediterranean garden; it counts with a comfortable sitting ideal to relax and a dining area with a beautiful wooden table. The kitchen that has access to a covered terrace and to the pool area is wonderfully furnished with a kitchen island and a larder. This floor counts with a double bedroom with access to a small conservatory where there is a single bed; ideal for children. Close to the bedroom there is a guest toilet and a bathroom with a bath and a separate shower.  From the living/dining room we access to the upper floor that offers two connecting double bedrooms (separated by a door). The second bedroom that has to be accessed through the first bedroom, is vey spacious and has direct access to the terrace. Both bedro
description: The property is completely fenced which is fantastic for families with children. Great swimming pool (3m. x 12m. Depth Min. 1m. Max. 1.60m.), ideal to refresh during the long summery days. By the pool there is a covered area with sun beds.
notes: Beautiful villa located in a residential area approx. 5 minutes drive to the charming and colourful fishing port of Porto Petro. There is hotel close to the house and you have the possiblity to use the tennis facilities. There are two beautiful sandy beaches in the area; Cala Barca Trencada approx. 900 m. drive but only 5 minutes if you walk by the coast. The other is the beautiful cove Calo de Sa Torre, about 950m. away. Porto Petro is a small village that offers some restaurants, a small supermarket and a few boutiques. The Natural Park Mondrago offers different routes where you can enjoy long walks as well as pretty sandy beaches such as Cala Mondragó away and S’Amarador, approx. 2.5 km away. The tourist resort Cala Dor with a bustling night life, a wide variety of restaurants, shops and its lovely marina is less than 10 minutes drive.
interaction: UNO+TRES will give you a telephone number  for  questions and help. (office hours) IMPORTANT: IMPORTANT : Please note that in JUne , July, August and September the house is rented from Saturday to Saturday.
house_rules: Please be careful with the use of the wáter and the air conditioner (if available) as we are following the new ecological rules of the island.

name: Sa Barca - house in Cala Santanyí with sea views
summary: Welcome to this splendid house very close the sea with direct seaview. It is prepared for 4 persons.
space: The furnished terrace nourishes you with a mediterranean breeze, while you enjoy memorable moments with your loved ones. The second terrace on the first floor will offer you the perfect place to relax on the sunloungers.  On the ground floor, you will find two bedrooms and a bathroom with a shower. One of the bedrooms has a double bed and the other has two individual beds. On request, we can provide a babybed and a high chair.  The dining room is equipped with a dining table for 4, satellite TV and central heating. The independent kitchen works with gas and counts with all necessary utensils to prepare a perfect family dinner. You will also find a washing machine, an iron and an ironing board.

neighborhood_overview: You can easily reach privileged places and natural areas, which decorate the southern coast of the island, to have a refreshing walk or do some cycling. Don't miss out on the beautiful sandy beach of Es Trenc, the Natural Park of Mondragó or the Cabrera Archipelago Natural Park. The nearby villages of Santanyí, Ses Salines Cas Concos or s'Horta are also worth a visit.
notes: Check-in: 4 pm Check-out: 10 am Very late arrival (from midnight) has an extra cost of 50 € No pets allowed. Contact the advertiser for possible additional charges. The celebration of parties and events is not permitted.

host_about:
My name is Angela and I’m working for Villafinca, a company managing reservation services in order to give property owners the chance to rent their property. 

Thanks to Villafinca, lots of private property owners are able to offer a good service to their clients who rent their properties, which would not be possible without us as many owners lack the necessary know-how and/or do not speak many languages. 

How can I describe best my team? Well, we are dynamic and active, we speak 5 languages and do our best to manage your renting so you have a satisfactory stay. 

Besides, I would like to tell you that we visit and check all of our properties on our own. Furthermore, we are there for you in situ and are happy to assist you with all doubts you may have. 

Hola soy Angela y trabajo para Villafinca, donde nos dedicamos a gestionar el servicio de reservas para los pequeños propietarios que quieren alquilar sus casas y no pueden encargarse de realizar este trabajo! Muchas veces por falta de tiempo o desconocimiento de idiomas.

Gracias a Villafinca, muchos pequeños propietarios pueden dar un buen servicio a los huéspedes que quieren alquilar sus propiedades. 

¿Cómo puedo describir de mejora manera nuestro equipo? Pues somos gente dinámica y activa, hablamos 5 idiomas y nos dedicamos a gestionar su alquiler para que su estancia sea totalmente satisfactoria.

Es muy importante señalar que visitamos y revisamos todas las propiedades a las que realizamos alquileres. Además le atenderemos en destino para cualquier duda que pueda surgir.

name: Apartment in center of Cala d'Or
space: Apartment in the center of Cala d'Or to the typical Ibizan style, with 2 double bedrooms, bathroom with bath, toilet, fully equipped kitchen. lounge / dining room and large outdoor terrace. Located in the center of Cala d'Or, has the beaches of Cala d'Or and Cala Gran only 200 m, and 400 m away is the marina of Cala d'Or and other beaches like Cala Esmeralda, Cala Ferrera and Cala Serena. It is also found surrounded by restaurants, cafes, bars, and all kinds of shops (shops, supermarkets, etc.). All fully accessible on foot in 5 minutes. To 1 km from the tennis courts and 5 km from Vall d'Or Golf.

name: CAS ROTER -  Villa with pool
summary: Welcome to this beautiful country villa in Santanyi. It accommodates 6 people + 1 extra.
space: The exterior areas are very nice, it has a large terrace, a salt water pool of 12 x 3.5 m with a depth ranging from 1.10 to 1.7 m, an outside shower, a fully equipped porch, barbecue and beautiful countryside views. The house of 200m2 is distributed over two floors, and it has many rustic elements. There are 3 bedrooms on the ground floor; two with double bed and one with two single beds. Two of the bedrooms have an en suite bathroom with shower. The extra place can be accomodated in a single sofa bed. One cot and a highchair are available on request. In addition to en suite bathrooms, there is another bathroom with bathtub on the ground floor.  The cozy living room is equipped with a sofa, a TV Sat and a coffee table. The dining room features a large table and chairs in manor style. The independent kitchen with induction, has all the necessary cooking utensils. A washing machine, iron and ironing board are also avialable. There is oil central heating throughout the whole house. NOTE:

Also within a few km you will find many beautiful crystal clear coves, etc. Visit the Mondragó Natural Park in Santanyó, where you can make beautiful excursions. Less than 10 km away you will reach Cala d'Or with its lively nightlife and wide range of leisure activities. The capitall city, Palma de Mallorca, is about 50 minutes away.

name: Finca Es Fasser
summary: Beautifully restored 250 year old farmhouse that has been transformed into this luxury high quality family home. Three excellent local restaurants are within walking distance.
space: Location Originally dating back to the 17th century Finca Es Fasser is one of our finest restored original farmhouses in our extended programme. Situated off a winding country lane within a few minutes walking distance to the small village of Calonge where you will find three excellent restaurants and village atmosphere with childrens play in the main plaza. Enjoy an early morning stroll to the excellent local bakery to visit Margaritata in "Forn Calonge" for an excellent selection of local breads and ensimadas With many beautiful sandy coves  including Cala Mitjana, Cala Sanau and cosmopolitan Cala D'Or with boutique shops and an international array of restaurants and local Tapas bars only a few minutes away this is an ideal family holiday choice. Fully fitted modern kitchen with dishwash

name: Country estate Lasata
summary: "Lasata" is the Native American term for "place of peace". Spacious country estate Lasata is an absolutely outstanding property. It is situated in an idyllic and secluded location between Santanyi and the idyllic village of Alqueria Blanca on a fabulously beautiful plot.
space: The country estate Lasata really is one of the most spectacular objects on offer. The dream beautiful house offers everything to be desired in terms of beauty, location, equipment and design. The approach to the wrought-iron gate already promises an estate of a special kind. Upon entering, you drive along a cypress-lined path to the main house. The closer you get, the more you will feel the unique aura surrounding the house. Once there, it offers a property that meets all expectations. A clear, typical Majorcan architecture on a beautifully landscaped plot of impressive 26,600 square metres. An automatic irrigation system ensures the quality of this idyll throughout the year, leaving the lush Mediterranean vegetation of palms, olive trees and other plants shine all year round. Wide-lined natural stone steps lead to a phenomenally large swimming pool on the far side of the property. At 20 metres length, athletically active people can truly enjoy themselves in this water here. This total
